name: Elizabeth Reddington
text: enjoyed my time. will be back for sure

name: bjnewman2222
text: I rented a pontoon boat for the afternoon this past Saturday.  Form my initial call to ask about availability to our successful rental and return of the boat, the experience was seamless.  They easily accommodated the last minute rental, were flexible when dealing with the challenges of the boat (radio), we're very timely with getting the boat in and out of the water and maintained a professional approach throughout.  There was some confusion about fuel charge that was completely my misunderstanding. No fault of theirs. Again, management handled it very well. Would surely recommend rentals from them.

name: Dale Jackson
text: Great spot for fuel, and ice, on Lake Tuscaloosa, just south of Tierce Patton farm Rd, off 43.

name: Ryan Teel
text: Josh and crew are the best. Always willing to go above and beyond to help out. Thanks so much, guys.

name: Mark Choquette Jr.
text: Small ramp with ample parking.  Was here for a High School Tournament and did not get to use all of their facilities.

name: albert mccracken
text: They are the best and Johnny does a great job!!!

name: Phillip Combs
text: Good place to load your boat don't have to worry about meth heads breaking into your stuff while on the lake

name: John Morgan
text: I lay out of work all week and show up on the weekends several hours late and still haven't been fired.  But I must say, they have one hell of a pro shop. You need it, they have it.

name: xavier ross
text: website states “pontoon rentals 7 days a week!!!!” but when i tried to call on monday, they were closed. false advertisement, will never do business.

name: John LaGrone
text: Affordable Decks it's a Great Place

name: alex shows
text: Turned boat in to get worked on. It was clean when I turned in and very grease and dirty when I picked it up.

name: gigi
text: Beautiful place

name: gigi
text: Beautiful place

name: Jackie Roberts
text: Had an amazing trip T J and Tyler did an amazing job.I would recommend them highly enjoyed every minute thanks guys

name: Jamie Hirtz
text: We got down to Destin on Saturday, our 5 year old and 6 year old decided they wanted to do some fishing so we called around and everyone was booked but we were lucky and got a spot with High Cotton a few days prior to them taking us out and making time for us! We wanted to do a shorter trip, as we didn't know how the kids would do. Shorter trips were unheard of down here but TJ was all for it! We scheduled for a 2 hour and were playing by ear a 3rd and 4th hour. Our oldest wasn't doing great with sea sickness, but our 5 year old was LOVING it and every time we caught a fish, TJ cheered out and was so excited for our son! In the 2 hours we were our, we caught 7 fish and a good sized bullshark! Captain TJ and Tyler were awesome and got us exactly what we wanted for our boys! Highly recommend and we will be using him every time we come back.

name: Lenny Michaela
text: We have chartered the High Cotton at least 7 times now over the years.  Captain Chris owns and operates the boat which fishes 10 people fairly comfortably. We have consistently had huge catches of Red Snapper along with Mackerel, Trigger Fish, Amberjack, Wahoo, Mahi Mahi, and several fish per trip that we couldn't even get off the bottom!  If you want a quality trip,  go fishing on High Cotton!

resp.text:
Man THANK YOU LENNY
It has been great getting to know you’re family. I can’t wait for next year.
Chris

name: Leslie Burrow
text:
I can't recommend High Cotton Charters enough! I haven't been on the water in 30 years and it was a first for my son. Captain Chris Garner was the best host and his crew never skipped a beat!

And that 23lb Red Snapper didn't hurt either!!!

name: Brian Cartee
text: Best charter ever. We were on the fish all day. Limited out on big fish. First wahoo I ever put in the boat.  No doubt I'll be a repeat customer.

name: Jeff Sanders
text: Been on plenty of trips with High Cotton. Capt Chris and his crew work hard to provide unique solid offshore fishing trips. Had yet to have a trip where we don't come back with fish! If you've got a specific experience your looking to accomplish offshore give Chris a call and he will give you the best solution to your offshore fishing experience. If you want to catch wahoo, king mackeral, mahi mahi, amberjack, red snapper, grouper, sharks, tuna, or whatever else is out in the Gulf... he will give you the best solution to what time is best to go and seasons. Plus his boat is phenominal. High class fishing on a high class fishing yacht. You won't be disappointed.

name: Tyler Keeley
text: Had a great experience fishing with Captain Chris and first mates Holt and Shawn.  We had around 13 people and had no problems getting everyone fixed up and fishing.  The boat was great and had plenty of room to sit inside if it got too hot or someone wanted to relax.  I even took a nap on the way back to land in one of the bunks. It was awesome!  I would highly recommend High Cotton to anyone coming to the area to do some fishing.  Lot's of fun!

resp.text: Glad you had lots of fun! Lets do it again. Thanks for the review!

name: jacob moseley
text: Our first trip on the High Cotton was an awesome experience.  We caught our limits of Snapper and Beeliners. We fished nine people comfortably. The boat was super clean and plenty of room to get out of the sun while traveling. Captain Chris,  First Mate Holt, and deck hand Mattie were unbelievably organized and insightful. They were busting it all day keeping us hooked up and reeling. Very good boat, even better people, I will definitely be calling them again for my next trip.

resp.text: Thank you, Jacob! Let's do it again!

name: Jason Thomason
text: Chris and his guys put us on the tuna.  We were the guy's that smashed them on the dock today. They worked hard to make sure we had a great trip

name: john russell
text: have fished with these guys on multiple trips... always make fishing fun, great crew, Chris does a great job... likes to teach and talk about what is going on during the trip... would use again in a heart beat

name: Keith Royer
text: We had an excellent time on this Orange Beach fishing charter.  We caught tons of fish on the nicely setup fishing boat and our Orange Beach fishing trip is one we will tell our friends about.  We're coming back in May for another Alabama fishing charter.

name: Thomas Rucker
text: First time fishing offshore for me. Had a great experience and already planning for the next trip.

name: Trevor Stockholm
text: This was the best Orange Beach Charter fishing trip we've been on.  Captain Chris knows his stuff!   We've been on several Orange Beach fishing trips and this one was off the hook...

name: Dave Schreier
text:
Fish with High Cotton every year, 6, 8 and overnight Tuna.
Captain, Vessel​, equipment and crew are first class.
Do yourself a favor and check this charter out

name: Ashley Byrd
text: Cappy's Boats was an amazing experience! This was my first time being the "Captain" and I was very nervous. They walked me through everything and made me feel at ease. The boat was beautiful and my family had a blast out on the lake. I will definitely use them again. Highly recommend!

name: Tressa Terrell
text: Excellent service and prices. Highly recommend multi-day rental. You can keep overnight and get a nice discount. Boat was in great condition and enough speed to pull a tube and cruise the lake.

name: Matt Harrison
text: We rented a boat from Cappy's this week and it was a wonderful experience. The boat (Grover, named after the Muppet) was in excellent condition and it performed beautifully. The staff was absolutely amazing! They were friendly, responsive, and made an extra effort to ensure our trip was a positive experience. Cappy's location is perfect for anyone coming from I-65 to reach quickly and easily. The reservation process was painless and the staff was always available to quickly answer any questions. The inclusion of a tank of gas embedded into the rental price kept us from getting hit with "add on" fees that most places charge on top of the rental cost. The shop has a variety of quality products in case you forget something and it has super clean restrooms and separate changing areas so that you can get out of wet clothes before you leave. All in all, it was a great day on the lake thanks to Cappy's.

name: Leah Hoppes
text:
Rent your boat from here! We rented from a different place earlier in the week and it was just awful, this was a night & day difference!!. Gretchen was so sweet, and they were efficient, helpful and their boats were all super clean.
Some boat rentals plaster sign o
n the side but Cappys doesn't- a nice bonus if you don't want to advertise you're renting😁

name: Don Williams
text: Having rented boats at Smith Lake elsewhere in the past over the phone, it always seemed like a "handshake deal" and I would be nervous about having a boat until we showed up and they had a boat available for us. That anxiety was not part of the equation this year as we rented with Cappy's. They have a modern web presence, very organized process for collecting information, and just overall seemed way more together than I was used to. They also offer multi-day rentals, which wasn't something any other rental companies I contacted offered - when on vacation it's obviously convenient to have the boat on your own dock each morning rather than having to go pickup a rental each day. Their boats are all newer and in great shape, and on top of that each member of the team we worked with - both over the phone and in person - could not have been nicer. Finally, their convenient location on the Cullman side paired with their well-stocked storefront allows for true no hassle rentals: they have everything you would possibly need for a day on the water. This place is the best and we are so grateful to have rented our boat with Cappy's this year!

name: Tony Lepone
text: Cappy’s Boats delivered a fantastic experience. Their facility and restrooms and super clean, the staff is friendly and helpful, and their boats were in excellent condition! I will definitely be coming back!

name: Katheryn Kennedy
text: We rented a boat from Cappy’s on Friday (6/18/2021).  I truly can’t say enough wonderful things about this experience.  Not only was the rental rate more than reasonable, Scott and his crew made sure we had a fantastic experience, from beginning to end.  If you need to rent a boat on Smith Lake, let Cappy’s be your guides!  256-756-SWIM.

name: Jinger Blackmon
text: Brand new boats .Nice employees.Great boat docks .Great price for rental

name: Tiffany Miller
text: Would give no stars but that's not an option. Arrived at 8am to pick up a Bentley Pontoon that seats 14. That wasn't available. Replacement was broken. Waited, for original boat to be picked up from,,,, somewhere.... The trim on the motor didn't work. The prop was broken. And the radio didn't work!?! Contacted them and was told they would get the other fixed it a replacement for us. So we started back toward the marina. Boat started losing power about 20 minutes into trip. Alarms started going off 30 minutes in. Every 10 mins to stop to cool engine!!! Called and texted again. No response! Returned boat at 245. Only to be given excuses, one after another. After a the teenager that meets you there called him, we explained the situation. We were riding informed that we had the boat for a full day and wouldn't be given a full refund.. We only wanted a partial. It was rented for 24 hours, left marina at 9. Returned @ 2:45. Spent half that trying cooling the engine!!! 6 hours for$680!!! I don't think so! Still waiting to hear from the owner! There website is joke! Nothing SAFE about their boats!

name: Pam Miller
text:
BUYER BEWARE........JULY 2021.  Does not deserve one star.  ALL THE GOOD RATINGS ARE SEVERAL YEARS OLD!!!!
Didnt get the boat we reserved, the next one was broken as the steering cable was broken.  So we got a back up.  Prop was broken, sent us out with no gas, trim didnt work, latches for canopy were broken, couldnt go more than 10 mpg so no tubing.  Radio didnt work.  Called owner stating we were coming back after having it for only 3 hours of a 24 hr rental.  They had nothing else.  Refused to refund us saying we had it all day.  Again signed for 24 hour rental.  Got mad at us and hung up on us.  When we returned the boat their dock hands were trying to rent the boat we had that wouldnt steer.  Ruined our day plus ripped us off $700 plus $150 in gas.  Wont return calls.  We have filed fraudulent claim with bank and plan to file fraud charges with police as well.  They are dangerous and poor buisness people.  Buyer Beware.

name: Phat Phan
text: If you plan on going real slow on the boat, then this is the place. Such a waste of time trying to go to different places on the lake cuz the pontoon engine speed is limited. I understand it’s probably for “safety” reasons but a complete waste of time. Rented a tube and the kids can’t even have fun cuz it was so slow. Wouldn’t recommend renting.

name: blair brown
text: Well, called the number that is listed here and it was the wrong number so…..not off to a good start at all. No thanks.

name: Ryan McDonald
text: Would give it a negative star rating if I could, completely unprofessional and kept hanging up on me while I’m trying to ask questions about renting a boat from them

name: Connie Maynor
text:
My family rented a ski boat for 4th of July. When we arrived the boat we were given was at least 10 years old and beaten up with seats split open or falling off. The boat stopped running twice in the first hour and we finally got the engine started and brought it back only to be told to go back out and just call if issues. Less than an hour later we were stranded in the middle of the channel and called them again. They repeatedly assured us someone was on the way to get us but no one arrived. Finally after getting rained on and two people working on the engine for an hour we were able to get it started enough to drive back to the dock.

Upon arrival we found that no one had been coming to get us and that they didn’t have another ski boat available. The store manager was completely unprofessional and refused to refund anything but the 50$ tube rental fee. Save yourself a migraine and Ruined holiday, just rent from someone else.

name: Alison Collins
text: We had a great experience from start to finish.  They were very accommodating and really made us feel comfortable for those not familiar with pontoon boats. I would recommend them to anyone looking for a relaxing day out on the lake!  We will definitely return.

name: Joe too lit
text: I’m from the city & I’m visiting family in Alabama so maybe it’s just me being a city person but no way in hell you can run a legit business without a website & phone number.

name: Lynn Burka
text: I would give them no stars if I could!  They emailed told us we had a boat rented, and they would contact us later that day.  I then went online and booked a house on the lake that is non-refundable only to have Mrs. Talley rude to me and tell me that she has been booked for weeks.  I asked then why does her email to me say otherwise?  She then said listen lady you can call other boat rental companies, it is not my problem and hung up on me!

name: Hal Hassall
text: Super friendly folks, great value and service, lovely pontoon boats. We had sooooo much fun that we rented a second day. Whenever you're at Lake Guntersville, this is the place from which to rent your boat!

name: Tony Newhouse
text: Excellent customer service from good people. Boats are clean, well kept & the staff goes above and beyond to make your visit enjoyable. Will be back with the grands!

name: Mica Domerese
text: Don’t know about their service, but do know that she was to busy to talk on the phone for a minute.... Need to hire themselves a secretary that can take care of potential customers ... I quote, the lady that answered, “I’m real busy right now, trying to get customers on a boat.”

name: Shannon Provence
text: his is my 2nd time renting.  These guys are so nice and easy to deal with. And the boats are all new and clean

name: Jake Smith
text: Great service Great staff, My family had a great day on the lake.  Cant wait to do it again

name: Thomas Neumann “Crazyballer gamer”
text: I've been trying to call them for a few days and they haven't answered there phones

name: Tina Greenlee
text: Love Guntersville

name: Shannon Provence
text: Great experience!!!

name: Shawnda Bickel
text: Over-priced, slides didn't work, we made the best of it and had a good time

name: Chris Sanchez
text: Great place, friendly staff. Me and the family had a blast. Parked the pontoon on an island that we had to ourselves.

resp.text: Thank you Chris! Hope to see you guys again

name: Courtney Medlock
text: DO NOT RENT HERE!!!  We rented the double slide 24 ft pontoon boat. It maxes out at 7mph. Terrible. The slide pump didn’t work.  It was so ran down that the trim piece was missing 5 screws and pinched/cut my leg when trying to get into water. I showed the manager Travis my leg and the boat where it was damaged and he actually had the nerve to ask me if we damaged it instead of apologizing. Totally unprofessional!  Very disappointing experience!!!

name: Shawn McWhirt
text: It’s called Hudson Pontoon Rentals, so I thought I was renting a pontoon.  My email confirmation even said pontoon rental.  I did not.  We got a terrible 19 ft fishing boat with a steering wheel about to come off, the rpm meter didn’t work, and the fuel gauge didn’t work. We were not given proper safety requirement instruction and were pulled over by police boats as a result.  The officer mentioned he had pulled our boat over the day before.  It was a terrible experience!  Don’t rent a boat here!

resp.text:
We are sorry ms. McWhirt for your experience. Our 19’ Sea Pro is the only fishing boat for rent in our boat rental “fleet”. All the rest of our rentals are pontoon boats.
We hope you have better experience on your next visit to Orange Beach.

name: Edward Godbold
text: Tiffany was amazing and the whole experience was 10 star. Thank you Tiffany for making our trip special!!!

name: Wendy Drouin
text: Very nice people! Great service and the boat was in great condition.

resp.text: Thank you ms. Drouin!

name: John Spencer
text: Went on 6 hour trip and had a blast, several large red snapper were caught including a 24 pounder, would recommend

name: Ken Daniels
text: Very nice and friendly service

resp.text: Thank you mr. Daniels!

name: Tommie Hicks “Tommie Jean” Hicks
text: My friends and I rented our first pontoon at OB Watersports. We were absolutely amazed. The pontoon was terrific and the staff member Brandon was so informative and gave us all the safety tips and things to watch for that would make our day the best ever.  We had such a good day.  All the  information Brandon gave us was the key to keeping our day interesting for sure, so much to see and such a relaxing day on the water.  I will recommend OB Watersports to everyone  and we will definitely go back. Thank you OB Watersports and Brandon.

name: Chelsey Tomlinson
text: My family and I rented a boat from this company this past weekend! We had a great time! The staff was super helpful and informative. They made sure we understood the safety measures, and felt comfortable with driving the boat! The boat looked brand new, and ran great! My favorite part was the fact we were only about five minutes away from the islands! We will definitely be renting from them again!

name: Melina Seagraves
text: Me and a couple of girlfriends spent the weekend in Gulf Shores and used OB Watersports for a day on the water. Upon arrival, we were placed on a brand new beautiful pontoon! None of us knew how to drive a boat so we reserved a captain for the day and he was fantastic. He was very informative, made sure to point out specific cool hot spots, and made sure we were enjoying our afternoon. We thoroughly enjoyed our day on the water. The staff was very friendly and helpful with all our questions as well. I would highly recommend renting from them when in town!! You won’t regret it!

name: Garrett Keating
text: I recently rented a pontoon from these guys for the day and the only regret I have is that I haven't done it sooner. From Chelsey in the office, to Eric on the dock, the staff could not have been any more helpful. I would recommend this company to anybody who is coming to the area and looking for some fun on the water. We were only a few minutes away from the islands too so we didn't lose any time running around.

name: Zoe Brooks
text: Me and some friends rented a boat through OB Watersports and had a GREAT experience! Staff was super nice and helpful and gladly answered any questions we had! The boat was kept up very well and ran perfectly, it couldn’t have been a better experience! Highly recommend and will definitely be using them in the near future.

name: Thaddeus Fennig
text: Loved our experience with OB!! Great time out on the water. Got to see dolphins and the boat hands were super knowledgeable and friendly. They knew where to go to find wildlife and safe spots for kids to swim. With covid and everything it was a really good time to get away. I would use them again in the future!

name: Chris Odom
text: Great experience all around!!! Super friendly staff from the first phone call to the departure! Check in was a breeze and they even asked to help carry our things to the boat! They had great knowledge about the waterways and told us about some cool places to visit.  When we got back, the team was there to greet us and hear about our day! If your thinking about renting from these guys, DO IT!!!!!

name: TRIPP TRIPP
text: We had a blast with our rental!! After renting from 3 other places previously and working all year long for a one week vacation this was absolutely the highlight of our week! The weather wasn’t supposed to be nice on the day of our rental so they offered to either reschedule us or give us a FULL refund! We took our chances with the weather and while we did get rained on for about 10-15 minutes, our day was by no means ruined! The pontoon boat was ten times better than what we had rented from other rental companies in the area, the staff was incredibly helpful and willing to go above and beyond to make us repeat customers. We will have no problem on choosing who to rent from in the future! Thank you so much OBWatersports for a great day on the water and for helping make our family vacation amazing!!

name: River Leslie
text: We rented a boat from OB water sports this past weekend and it was the best experience ever!! The boats were so nice and well kept, we had so much fun and the employees were so great and helpful!! i highly recommend and i would definitely go back and rent from them again!! I would give TEN stars if i could!!:)

name: Mikey Patchanian
text: I’ve really enjoyed the many experiences with OB Watersports. They definitely know how to help everyone experience everything good while vacationing or just taking a day to enjoy this paradise. Thank you and looking forward to next time!

name: Andrew Leckie
text: Great boat rentals. Visited my family in Orange Beach for the weekend and Brandon made sure we were taken care of with a great boat, explained everything about the boat and taking it out, great prices for pontoon rentals! Would highly recommend going and seeing them, ask for Brandon, he helped out so much!

name: Colette Robertson
text: Wonderful day on the water! Captain Eric was wonderful. He took us to see dolphins and baby dolphins, which was beautiful. He provided us with lots of information about the area. Took us for a tasty Bushwacker at Pirates Cove. Great day and memories. Thank you.

name: emily diaz
text: Great company to use if your trying to have a fun day with family and friends. Great equipment and good customer service. I highly recommend this company if your looking to rent a boat in orange beach!

name: Bailey McMaster
text: Rented a pontoon boat from these guys and they were extremely kind and helpful!! Nice boats and great customer service. Highly recommend and will be using them again next time! Thanks guys!!!

name: Jessica Skinner
text: Captain Slade and Tristan done a very good job and made sure everyone on the boat felt comfortable! Would definitely do it again! It was a once in a lifetime experience!

name: Blake Donaldson
text: 5/5 stars. Great customer service & safety speech. Everything went as planned and my family and I had a wonderful time. Will rent from here in future!

name: Colby Lavoie
text: This was an amazing experience and a great company to rent from! Boats were well maintained and ran very well! Highly recommend and will definitely use them in the future!

name: chip begnaud
text: Very clean nice boats. People are very nice and easy to deal with. Pricing is very reasonable. Highly recommended.

name: Kenny McBride
text: I reserved the "Luxury Pontoon Boat" this past weekend. Specs on their website cited a 90hp motor and 25' overall length. We were put on a 20' boat with a 50hp motor. I asked Blake, the safety instructor, if we were on the correct boat and he assured me that we were on the correct boat. This boat was nothing close to what they have advertised on the website. Seats had rips in them, the 'dry storage' compartments were all soaking wet, two of the speakers did not work, and the hinges on the back compartments were broken. Very disappointed. Boat was miserably slow. Wanted to give these guys a shot, but we'll be bringing our business back to Lil Johns in the future.

name: Rachel Vickers
text: Had a great time when I went with my family!!! We had lots of fun and an enjoyable day!!! The boats worked great and we had no problems. Thanks OB Watersports for a great experience!

name: Ryan Klein
text: It was our first time in Orange Beach and we rented a pontoon for the day and it was a blast! We got there a little early and they walked through everything with us and even gave us some great recommendations for food! Great experience for first time pontooners and we will be back!

name: Mary Gayle Mitchell
text: Very nice boats! They have the best rates for what you get. Blake was a big help with send us out and returning also helping load and unload the boat.

name: Amoreena Brewton
text: We like the captained charter the very best, but the party barge with slide is super fun for the kiddos.  It’s nice to have the whole family relax together on the water.

name: Heather Norwood
text: Beautiful new Pontoon. Our large family thoroughly enjoyed our day on the water. The company was friendly and very helpful. I would highly recommend renting from them when in town.

name: Kassie Boles
text: We rented from OB Watersports and we loved the staff as well as the boat!! It was reasonably priced and so close to the Islands!! Definitely recommending to everyone I know and booking again!!

name: Tiffany Ramey
text:
We had a great experience renting from OB Watersports . The girl working told us where to eat & visit . (She also told us where to hid from the nasty tourist that are here this year ! In years past the people were more pleasant.)
The boat IS a rental boat . There were some dings and scratches . The motor ran just fine ! We will be back to see Blake and rent a boat from him.

name: Alyssa Mashburn
text: Amazing Experience with Captain Slade and his deck hand Tristan!!!!! Would 10/10 recommend them and would go again. They made the experience so much fun!!!!

name: Amber
text: Great crew, customer service, and an awesome place to take the family for a relaxing day out! I use this place every time I visit and always have a good time!

name: Rich Walls-El Bey
text: Over the phone, the lady was very irritated when I asked her questions. I asked for her name and to speak to a manager and she refused to surrender either one. She then put a female co-worker on the phone who claimed to be the owner and told me to just use someone else. Absolutely the worst customer service I’ve ever experienced and I would never rent from them.

name: Crystal LeBlanc
text: Had such an amazing time! We truly needed that break. Tiffany made sure we were taken care of and we'll be back for sure!!

name: Will Duck
text: Very nice equipment and great customer service. Can’t go wrong when doing business with these guys!!

name: Drew Wooley
text: We rented a boat for the day with OB Watersports. They were very helpful and booking with them was easy. I'll be sure to use them again when we come back down.

name: Marlee Metcalf
text: The highlight of our trip!!! Friendly staff, excellent customer service, overall a top notch experience. Highly recommended for families!

name: chase osborne
text: I loved it! Had a great time, would recommend to anyone! Definitely going to do it again!

name: mary todd
text: we rented a boat from OB watersports for the first time, the boats were much nicer than the other companies!!! Blake did a fantastic job, everyone was very nice and helpful for us!!

name: Sarah Anderson
text: Awesome boats and awesome asset in the young man running down there... we had asked to speak with manager and he said he’s the only guy there ... he did an awesome job

name: Melissa Rehage
text: Rented two pontoon boats, one luxury and one triton and both were excellent, clean, nice rentals.  Quick and easy to get going and great customer service.

name: Misty Wheelock
text: If I could give a 0, I would. We had a terrible experience. The help was great, but the owner was dishonorable and greedy!!!! It was rainy so we waited around for an hour. We were offered to reschedule for another day or that we could still go on the water for the remaining time but with at least $100 refund. We returned after 2 hours instead of 3 due to severe thundering, lightning, and pouring down rain. When asked for the refund, the owner refused according to his boat hand. We asked to speak with him. We were told that he was too busy and that he now wasn’t going to refund us because we took the boat out. That is soooo cowardly and a poor way to run a business. We had to call and speak to a young innocent front desk girl explaining the situation and he finally gave us some money back. I would not work for this business or rent for them!!!!! BEWARE!!!!!

resp.text: Thank you for the review... there are no refunds for weather and you received your refund because you threatened to do this and you did it anyways so seems like you weren’t owed a refund at all and you got one and still wrote a review ... please don’t use us again

name: Douglas Folk
text:
Friendly Service,
Not sure why equipment wasn't up to standard. No Horn. Lights didn't work. (didn't need them) but if we did- too bad. I would question if fire-extinguisher would have worked and I didn't look for all the floating devices.  Boat seemed out of balance too. Not really complaining. We had a good time. My point is why not have everything in good working order. As a one time a year boater I didn't notice the other things until we were underway.  That is my fault. It's like renting a car. I expect the tires to be good, safety belts, breaks etc. I don't care if the lights aren't needed or can't be used. If we broke down and needed assistance - and it was after dusk/dark. We'd have no way to show our location. Using our phones should be an option, not a requirement. Having a working Horn is a requirement. I didn't leave a review to argue. I left a review because I received an email from you guys. I stated facts. I am not saying I wouldn't use your rental again. You have a nice place and I was treated very well.  Balance issue was bow to stern not Port - Starboard.

resp.text: That particular boat the gas tank is on the port side (left) instead of the middle.  The fire extinguishers are checked at the beginning of each season. It had 15 life jackets, a throw cushion for man overboard, a paddle & a first aid kit.  The lights aren’t required for our boats since they due in no later than 6:00pm during peak season and if rented after peak season. we adjust the time they are due in. We would have been happy to address any questions you had after the safety speech.  Thank you for your feedback.

name: Rudy Rudolph
text: Tiffany was so helpful and friendly! Great service and great prices on rental

name: Kendra Lawson
text:
Even 1 Star is too much!!! DO NOT RENT A BOAT FROM THIS PLACE! They scam people and they refuse to own up to anything. We rented a boat through OB Water Sports (charge was through FH*Southern Rose) and the boat was faulty. They tried to blame us and we barely even got it out of a no wake zone and we were never able to use the tube we also rented in a separate purchase. We immediately called and told them there was a problem with the boat and it would not accelerate. Before we even told them what it was doing, Blake (who works for OB Water Sports), said we must have hit bottom and damaged the prop, but we never did and we no that for a fact. We also did not give him enough information for him to have any idea what was wrong. We called them 35 minutes after we left the boat slip (and we had been in a no wake zone for 33 minutes). We asked if they could bring us another boat and he said he didn’t have one and he didn’t have a way to even come to us. He said we would need to bring the boat back for him to replace the prop (which again he told us was the problem before we even gave him any details). We had 6 children with us that were so disappointed since we never got to do anything and it took us 1 hour and 20 minutes to get back to the dock because we could not go more than 5 MPH because the boat was not working properly.
When we got back to the OB Water Sports, Blake told us immediately that the prop was messed up and we must have done it, but again, we know for a fact that we did not hit bottom. We had 4 people on board with boating experience and we know that did not happen.
We asked him for a refund and he said they don’t do refunds. We told him that the boat did not work, but he kept making excuses. He told us we could take the other boat they had  for 1 1/2 hours because that was all the time left until 6pm which is when he had to go home. We asked to speak to the owner and refused to get him or tell us his name. He said if he gave us his name, he would be fired. We asked what other options we had and he said we could take the other boat (which he all of sudden had available...even though he didn’t when we called). We told him it would take us 30 minutes to get back out of the no wake zone, so we would have 30 minutes before we had to bring the boat back). He said that wasn’t his problem. He can’t control the Alabama water speed limits. We kept asking for him to please work with us to...give us different day or more time today, but he refused. He also told us this happens every day and they never do refunds.
We then asked if he would refund the tube rental since we were never able to even put it in the water and he immediately said...no refunds.
He told us twice that this happens every day!!! His excuses sounded rehearsed...like he has said the same thing to customers multiple times.

We feel like this was a breach of contract because they provided a faulty product!!!! BEWARE!!!!!

name: J.E. Carlson
text: We booked online with OB watersports for the first time. . It was easy. We were able to use a coupon from a coupon book we got at the grocery store and booked half day rental for the the next morning.  The coupon was for 10% off. The pontoon boat was great and met our needs for fishing and going to beaches. Everyone was very nice and helpful. The young man tells you how to avoid the sand bars and details of the boat.  I will book with them again next time.

resp.text: We try to be as helpful as possible while your on the boat.  Thanks for the kind words & we hope to see you next time your at the beach.  Thanks SJ

name: Courtney Oneal
text: I recommend them. Wonderful staff and safety precautions.

name: Maggie Hillard
text: My family rented a pontoon from here while on vacation. Great place! We loved our pontoon and the kids loved the slide. Owners were great very nice. I would definitely recommend and if we ever vacation in gulf shores again we definitely use them again!

resp.text: Thanks for coming out with us. We look forward to seeing you next time your in town.

name: Dakota Walters
text: Captain slade  and Tristan did an awesome job good people

name: Ryan Mason
text: Super friendly staff, funny and professional, had a great time! Will be going back next year for sure!

name: gabriel pereira
text: Best place to have fun with family, great staff.

name: Jacob White
text: Awesome experience, definitely recommend very easy process

name: pedro sotero
text: Had a great experience with them, i really recommend!

name: Emily Bowles
text: We really enjoyed our time on the pontoon boat with slides! We will be back next year same time again! Thanks so much!

resp.text: Thanks for coming out with us & we look forward to seeing you next year!

name: Amy Hedgcorth
text: We had a decent experience. We kayaked. The staff didn't give us any directions, so we were unsure where we were and weren't aloud to take the kayaks. When we returned, no one was outside so we didn't know where to take it. My husband went in and they said to leave it there in the water. We pulled it up a bit afraid it'll float off. Overall I can't complain but the staff isn't the best.

resp.text:
Hi Amy,
Not sure exactly which company that you went with but we don’t have any kayaks to rent we only do slide pontoons and Tritoon boats. My name is SJ and I own the business. Thanks.

name: bAsS hEaD
text: Great Experience, we will be returning!

name: Michael Monroe
text: What a joke. It rained the whole day we reserved for. But they wouldn't cancel. So we were forced to go or be charged $200. So we went, cold, cloudy, and some rain. We road 150 yards to the 1st island so we could warm the kids. No slide, water was freezing so we came back 90 minutes early. I asked for a refund and only got a $100 for not using the slide. We paid $320 for a nightmare and I got the flu... never again

name: Kenna Sparks
text:
If there was less than a 1 ⭐️ we’d give it. Our boat started SINKING in the middle of the bay SITTING THERE EATING LUNCH. They came and gave us a brand new boat with no complaints. We had a great time the rest of the day until we saw someone else come out in Boat 20 with pontoons filled with water.
These boats are not safe and the pictures are deceiving. BUYER BEWARE!!!

name: Brady Haynes
text: This is the best place to rent boats, kayaks and SUP boards in Orange Beach.  I have used OB Watersports for kayak rentals and SUP rentals and I have not been disappointed. Their location next to Tacky Jacks made them super easy to find and they were very easy to deal with (since I had to keep changing my pick-up time due to scheduling conflicts on my end).  I will definitely be using them again.

name: Neil McCray
text:
Tldr: AVOID THIS BUSINESS AND GO TO ORANGE BEACH BOAT RENTALS INSTEAD.

Rented pontoon boat for 4 hours. Before seeing our boat, man handling rental was rude and cut us off when we tried to ask basic safety questions. Very unpleasant. Attendant who took us to boat offered very little introduction re: safety or operation of boat. Reason they didn't want to show us anything became evident once we left the dock - while the boat runs, none of electronics including gas gauge were operational. No GPS, no air horn, no depth finder, no speedometer. Only noisemaker for event of emergency was a filthy old whistle taken apparently from a life jacket. When we realized almost immediately, we called - receptionist cut us off to say none of that stuff works. She assured us we had a full tank of gas, but was unconcerned that critical safety components of a boat they rented out were broken. Boat's speed was severely hampered by dysfunctional engine, which made it difficult to get anywhere in our allotted time, or to make it back to business by return time. Boat was filthy, with trash and cigarette butts floating in standing water they did not bother to clean out.

To sum up experience: bad service, bad maintenance, bad boat. If you want to rent a boat, head over to Captain Igor with Orange Beach Boat Rentals.

Update: to clarify, this review is about Orange Beach Watersports. Do not patronize this business. For boat rentals, look elsewhere. For example, Orange Beach Boat Rentals.

resp.text: Sir, you have us confused with another company.  We don’t have a Capt. Igor that works for us.  We are OB Watersports

name: Katie Nickelotte
text: Horrible service. Extremely rude and pushy. Didn’t give any guidance on where to go for non-locals or how to best use the equipment. Thankfully I had been paddle boarding before, but first-timers beware. The boards were covered in mildew and the guy was staring us down watching his clock when we came back towards the docks even though we were 20 minutes early. I can’t speak to any other vendors, but I definitely wouldn’t recommend this place to anyone.

name: Mike Nix
text: Back in June of this year my wife and I rented from OB Water Sports, these are some of the friendliest people you will ever do business with. Nice boats and they make you feel at home. Will do business with them again for sure.  Thank You Jeff and Kay.

name: Scott Ellis
text: Super nice brand new boat with a great staff!!!

resp.text: Thanks Scott! We appreciate your business

name: Jake Wilson
text:
Visited OB Watersports over spring break 2013. The owners were incredibly friendly! I absentmindedly got lost while driving, and I called them and they helped me get to their shop.
It was a wonderful wonderful experience. My friends and I canoed for several hours, swam and had hermit crab races at one of the islands. The area is really fun too. Lots of little shops and restaurants. Next time I am in the area, I plan to go back with a cooler and picnic on one of the islands we rowed to!

name: Kristin Waggoner
text: If you're looking for rude, pretty boys with bad attitudes then this place is perfect. If you're expecting a fiber glass board, it's a hit or miss. Half the paddles do not extend so you break your back. I have no idea why they ask if you've done it before. They don't give any pointers or directions if you say "this is my first time." Customer service was terrible. They are more concerned with answering the phone than dealing with the people in front of them. The island they rave about is nothing more than a grassy marsh 5 minutes away from the dock. Not worth the time or money.

name: Sandra Davis
text: Loved the experience of pari sailing...it was awesome. Defiantly will be doing it again

name: Ruben Rodriguez
text: I went kayaking great experience great service. I would recommend.

name: Kailee Jarboe
text: Had a great time paddle boarding, but the service was awful. The staff didn't communicate well and came across very rude. Some of the equipment was kind of run down and one of our paddles fell apart. I wouldn't recommend this place.

name: whitney brasell
text: Great service!!

name: phillip maddox
text: Bait and switch on equipment. Better locations for rentals, I suggest you look elsewhere.

name: Michael Watson
text: We had a horrible experience with this place.  The pontoon boat was dirty, falling apart, no ladder for swimming and non working fuel gage, torn seats, rude customer service.  It was a total rip off.   Rent somewhere else!

name: Sara Olivencia
text:
We went on the pirate cruise and it was so much fun! This was our second time on the cruise  and I would highly recommend it.

My kids 4 and 8 love it! The pirates are really friendly and talkative with the kids. The kids get to play lot of water games to stay cool.

There is very little shade. Wear sunblock and bring a couple cold bottles of water with you.

name: Patrick O'Connor
text: Phenomenal! Great Captains and Deck Hands. LOADS of fish. Take the 6 or 8 hour trip if serious about fishing. Take the 4 hour if you just want a boat ride.

name: Colton Sweeney
text: 4 hour fishing trip was actually not even 2 hours of fishing. They told us to be there 30 minutes early (7:30am) but we didn’t leave the dock til 8:30am. Took an hour to get to the fishing spot. We were constantly moving, so we couldn’t even let our bait sit for fish to get it. Don’t think anybody on the boat caught anything worth a picture. Cherry on top was when it took an hour and a half to get back to the dock. I’m not sure why but we were going the speed of smell. Only reason they get two stars is because the crew was nice.

resp.text: Thank you for your feedback. We will try to improve our performance in future.

name: Ron Sheffey
text: Not family friendly.  Crew used language not appropriate for children and did not want to help children or anyone . Bathroom was ridiculous for all! Captain had own agenda and did not consider passengers even with several very seasick.

name: Floyd Middleton
text: You'd like to go deep sea fishing I suggest you take this trip with these guys any one they got everybody's friendly and the captains put you on the fish great experience thank you

name: Sherry Stout
text: We had a great time.

name: Just V
text: Decent time.  Have been on many fishing trips. This was first time we didn't catch anything.  Deckhands said the captain was still in training.

name: Johnny Fuller
text: Had a fun trip.could use something to get your cooler back and forth from boat.its a long way  to get to boat

name: Jill McCowan
text: Even tho we got soaked on our tour and had to cut it short, it was still enjoyable.

name: Amy Jo
text: We had a great time on our dolphins cruise. The caption and deckhand were friendly. The kids had a blast and the views were amazing. The kids even had a water fight with pirates.

name: Jessica Standley
text: The dolphin cruise was amazing! Captain Jason and Brad did such a great job finding us dolphins and made sure that everyone had a great experience. 10/10 would recommend!

name: David r
text:
Water was very scenic. Crew member complimented my socks. Felt like a fisherboy. Saw a beer can and a styrofoam cup.

We also fished. Very enjoyable. Would recommend to a friend.

name: Kim Smyly
text: Great, helpful staff.  Captain was very good!

name: Angie Stiel
text: My fist time out on a fishing charter boat.  I loved it. Honestly didn't think I would enjoy it but when I reeled in my first tiny fish and then hit my monster fish I was hooked. The crew was very helpful and friendly. Shout out to first mate Jason and the other two crew members that worked their butts off to make sure we had a great time. Thanks to the captain for our safe return to dry land. I had a deal with my dad that I'd go but I was not touching any bait or fish lol. So yep I had a great time and best thing was I didn't even chum up the Gulf.  Dad holding my monster fish.

resp.text: Thank you for fishing with Hudson Marina!  We are glad to hear you had a great trip, and congratulations on your catch.  We appreciate your business and the time you took to leave a review.  Come back again soon.

name: Chad D
text: Friendly deck hands, very knowledgeable. Better if we would have caught more fish, but that's the way fishing goes sometimes. We took the 4 hour party boat deep see fishing service.

resp.text: Chad, thanks for the review and joining us. Hopefully the next time you join us the fish will be in a biting frenzy.

name: Rodney Ford
text: Waste of money be better off brim fishing

name: Robert M. Puig
text: I had an awesome time :) Great food, sights, he let us drive the boat. What a great time for a good cause too

name: mikey lemaster
text: One of the best places to fish that I have found. Our party limited out on Red snapper and the C.A.T. Captain and crew were great.

resp.text: Mikey, thanks for joining us on the C.A.T. We can’t wait to have you on board with us again.

name: Hannah Horohoe
text: The dolphin tour was a huge waste of time and money. We were asked to arrive early to prepare for the tour. At 3pm they had us walk down the dock to the boat, but did not allow us on the boat for twenty minutes and would not tell us why. After burning in the sun, they took us out to the gulf to see what we could spot. The captain would shout out dolphin “facts” over the intercom to keep us entertained. One of them being, “dolphins can get up to 10 tons.” The crew had us yell and clap at the dolphins when we saw them. I do not believe dolphins like to be catcalled since they would flee from the boat. I have done another dolphin tour in orange beach in the past. We should have returned to them. Overall, I do not recommend.

name: Amanda Rich
text: Absolutely everything I wanted and more! The crew was awesome! They helped make sure all of the kids got to reel in some good fish! Everyone in my party of 6 got to catch we had a blast!

name: bamababe75
text: We were supposed to be on the C.A.T.  but got bumped to a party boat. The Explorer.   They could not find  fish.  Worst fishing trip ever!  Deck hands were super nice but not very knowledgeable.  Definitely not worth $150.00!  I went on the Wishbone last year and it was amazing!  That was what I paid for this year but t was horrible! Never again!

name: Bryan degroot
text:
My boat engine died after towing it from Michigan with plans to fish with family. Obviously that plan changed, and we decided to fish from a party boat. Something I normally would not do, as experience has taught me that this is usually a low likelihood of success fishing trip, where little effort is put into ensuring a good shot at catching fish. Imagine my surprise, when we fished with Captain Dan aboard the Explorer. What a difference! The Captain put us on fish, and knew when and where to move to keep the action consistent, and stayed out a bit longer than planned to ensure everyone had a good shot at a catch. The crew, from First mate Jason to Julie, Steve, and Ashton, the entire team was first rate. They were fun, lively, VERY helpful and worked hard to keep lines in the water and made sure everyone was attended to, with bait, and fish removal as well as quickly fixing tangles, and kept everyone fishing.
By far the hardest working, and most attentive crew in Party boat fishing.!! Top notch. Thanks for your efforts!! I would recommend this group to anyone. Coming from our group of 10. Ranging from kids and 1st timers to experienced anglers, we all had fun.
Highly recommended trip.

resp.text: Thank you for your business and for leaving a review.  We are glad you had a great trip and appreciate the compliments you left for the captain and crew. We hope to see you again soon.

name: thomas lynch Jr
text: Fun place to go to see dolphin and for kids they have a pirates boat to

name: Lauren Schanz
text: The cruise and Captain was great.. The captain did an awesome job telling and showing us things about Orange Beach on top of seeing the dolphins. My family and I enjoyed watching the Dolphins. $10 a person is a great deal til have a to pay for an infant.. $3 a piece for can soda, water, chips and cotton candy absolutely ridiculous. Office staff could be a lot more friendlier and helpful. Three staff members and they couldn't even help find suitable life jackets for the children and infants. Couldn't find one infant life jacket so had to find the smallest child life jacket. They just sat there talking to each other and on the computers..

name: shelby leblanc
text: Sitting at the beach and Saw a boat that said Dolphin Tours, Hubby and I decided why not go on one. Best $12 ever spent. Got to see some dolphins, got to have some drinks and snacks! The bartender was super sweet as well as our tour guide, she has AWESOME recommendations for places to eat with the best views. Very cute family owned Business!

name: gary dollar
text: Best dolphin cruise I've been on. The operators were super fun and they made sure we saw dolphins of course but were super engaged with the whole group. Would definitely recommend.

name: Sara Benningfield
text: Well worth the money!! We had so much fun. We saw lost of dolphins and he was very informative about the cruise and what was going on. Also the co-captain Jason did an awesome job with the kids and keeping them interested and showing them where the dolphins were. We will be back!! Thank you for such a relaxing dolphin tour!!! 🐬🐬🐬

name: Mike McCravey
text: Took the family for a fishing trip while on vacation and had a wonderful time! We didn't catch much, but we had a few fish for dinner that night. The captain and crew were awesome and the boat was wonderful as well. For my first time out deep-sea fishing, this was a great experience.

name: Ashley DeBord
text: Had a great experience this evening on our dolphin tour. Even though we didn't see many dolphins, the crew made every possible effort to give us a great experience. Thank you!!

name: Christy Lewis
text: Thank you for a wonderful fishing adventure.  The crew was very attentive and personable.  We would recommend this trip/adventure to anyone who was looking for a fun adventure in the Gulf Shores/Orange Beach Area. 😀

resp.text: Thank you for booking with Hudson Marina!  We glad you had a great time fishing,  and thank you for the time you took to leave a review.  Come back again soon.

name: susan rice
text: We had a great experience! Caught lots of fish on our trip. Crew was friendly and helpful. Had an added on bonus with a dolphin jumping out of the water putting on a show right next to the boat.  Jedidiah... fish on!!!

resp.text: Thank you for fishing with us! Congratulations on your catch.  We appreciate your business and hope to see you again soon.

name: Adrienne Williams
text: Was a nice boat ride of the gulf and orange beach. Crew were very nice and knowledgeable of the surroundings. Saw a few dolphins and they made every attempt to show us them!

name: Eddie Ledkins
text: Deckhanded on the boats there last season. Good Captains and crew. Best prices on 4 hour deep sea fishing trips.

name: art moyer
text: Worst trip I've ever been on one of the mates was sea sick and the captain could not find the fish and out of 30 people only 6 fish longest was 16"

resp.text: Art, we apologize for it being a rougher day on the water and for the bite being slow that day. Hopefully next time the seas are calm and the fishing are biting

name: Kirstin Fullenwider
text: Highly recommend this place. Jason and Corbit were a lot of help and made this fishing trip one of the best I've ever had! Can't wait to come back next year!

resp.text: Thanks!  We love to hear great things about the crew!  We are glad you enjoyed the trip and hope to see you again soon.

name: adam quick
text: We were told to be there early because the boat was leaving at 7:30 well it was well after 8:00 when we finally left and everybody was catching good fish untill the captain wanted to keep moving, then one of the deck hands kept moving everybodies fish around and nobody knew where their fish were and there was some big fish that couldn't be found do to the deck hand swapping our buckets around, but due to leaving the dock late our trip was cut short. Other than that it was fun and we had a pretty good time I guess, deck hand todd was awesome and he deffently knew what he was doing

name: Kelly Standley
text: Had a great time on a four hour morning party trip. Every one in our group had a catch. Some with as many as 5-6.

name: Tabitha Freeman
text: I want to thank the captain and crew for making one of my sister dream come true she was diagnosed with stage 4 cancer  with only 6 to 12 months and although she was very sea sick they did everything to make sure she caught some fish and she said even though she got sea sick she would do it again  love them for  them making her feel great

name: Joe Eaton
text: Great boat ride. seen several dolphins playing. Crew was great, Captain was awesome, with the history, and knowledge of the area and dolphins as well

name: aften giles
text: Only saw like 2 dolphins while other dolphin cruises was going out not the ocean but not this one he did circles and pretty much didn’t go anywhere except the bay very disappointed

name: Daniel Alexander
text: I was highly disappointed in this cruise being I had gone deep sea fishing with the same company the day before and had an absolute blast. However this was not the case on the Dolphin cruise. Trouble started as soon as we boarded the boat. As we walked up the stairway to the upper deck to view the dolphins there were no benches or any permanent seating just the cheap white lawn chairs you buy at Dollar General. This not such a big deal but very in professional looking. Second of All as soon as we sit down in our lawn chair we noticed there were way to many people on the upper deck for the amount of chars provided. This was due to the lower deck witch is enclosed and air conditioned smelling like raw sewege. We not talking about a little stick, it was so bad not one person could stay inside and by the end of the trip the smell was leaking out of the lower deck and was ingulfing us on the stairway outside on the boat.This was my chief complaint just due to the fact I have 3 small children that use the bathroom a lot and I was having to go in and out of this stink a lot!! Also could have seen more dolphins from the beach and we had got a lot more close to the dolphins the day before fishing. It was hour into the trip before we seen a dolphin 200yds away.  People save your time and money huge let down on the dolphin Cruise. But the deep sea fishing trip is great.

name: Terry Hammond
text: Captain was pleasant and good with the kids. Even let them drive the boat. However didn’t see many dolphins.

name: Nik-Nik Pat
text: So sorry we we were running a little late Captain!! We had a  wounderful time.The water was beautiful and the dolphins were amazing.We saw one doing flips out of the water,he was for sure showing off.We will be back to bring the baby when she’s older.Godbless.

name: matt mansfield
text: Great experience even on a choppy day, the crew was very helpful and went above and beyond to make sure everyone (especially the kids) had a great experience

name: Justin Blair Fishing
text: Started out good saw dolphins then headed towards the inlet and open water and the captain went down stairs. Boat stopped and idled in the inlet for a good solid 10 minutes then when he came back we turned around and cruised the inlet then went back 2 stars only because we saw dolphins early on in the cruise after that nothing

name: Stefanie Miller
text: Capt Rodney and Porter were great. We saw some beautiful dolphins including a baby. Great time for the whole family.

name: Christina Conn
text: Great price and we saw tons of dolphins. The boat ride was very smooth too.

name: Drew Hysong
text: We had a great time and everyone should have caught at least one fish.  They were biting.

resp.text: Thank you for fishing with Hudson Marina!  We are glad you had a great time and appreciate the review you left.  We hope to take you fishing again soon.

name: Steve Fuller
text: The boat broke while we were out, so we stopped for a while to fix, then went unreasonably slow moving spot to spot.  Captain tried to pass the slow speed off as trolling, but it was unproductive as only 2 fish were caught in hours of trolling.  Nobody on the boat was satisfied with the their experience.

name: Kenny McCallister
text: Pirate ship adventure was a Great family trip! C.C. was awesome!!

name: Quan Nguyen
text: We had good time with captain Dan and his crews on the explorer

resp.text: Thank you for fishing with Hudson Marina!  We appreciate your business and the time you took to leave a review.  We are glad you had a great time and hope to see you again soon.

name: J C
text:
My husband and I are Snowbirds from Canada and we enjoyed a delightful voyage on the Perdido Queen at the Hudson Marina on February 22, 2017.

The lunch was delicious!  There was ample food for everyone!

Chicken, pork, salad, mashed potatoes, pasta, grilled vegetables, dinner rolls and strawberry bread pudding!  There is a bar onboard and you can enjoy an alcoholic beverage with your lunch.

Compliments to Chef Jonathan!  Two thumbs up!

It was a very smooth ride and we enjoyed seeing the sights!

The Staff is very professional and polite and assisted the passengers boarding and departing the Perdido Queen.

We will recommend the Perdido Queen to our American Snowbird friends!

resp.text: Thank you for cruising with Hudson Marina!  We are glad you had a great experience, and thank you so much for taking the time to leave a review. We hope to see you again soon.

name: Kelsey Sims
text: Worst dolphin tour I’ve ever been on. Captain complained over speaker the whole time. Took us to the end of the bay and said he wasn’t going any further because of waves. We literally sat there and watched other dolphin boats pass us to go out. Saw two dolphins fins. That was it. Paid $60 for 4 people for nothing. After tour, spoke with captain about how disappointed I was. He didn’t care. Called and spoke to manager and they were rude to me. Waste of time. Do not go on this tour. Choose a different company!

name: James Dennis
text: Caught my limit plus 2 big ones Jason really took care of all of us

name: Angel Reavis
text: Best dolphin cruise

name: Mark Waters
text: A one one thing.  We saw dolphin and nice landscape but overall not a highligt of summer.

name: Maddison Leonard
text: Really fun saw lots of dolphins

name: Judy Johnson
text: The  food on the valentine's  cruise  was disgusting.  Don't  waste  your .money.

resp.text: Thank you for your business.  We strive to provide each customer with an exceptional experience and apologize if you did not enjoy the activity.

name: Craig Hare
text: You will spend most of your time riding and not very much time fishing. Save your money and go to tje state park pier.

resp.text: Thank you for your business.  We apologize for any inconvenience you experienced.  It is our goal to provide each customer with an excellent experience.

name: Denisa Berry
text: Very enjoyable.

name: Michael Brown
text: They will cancel on you!!!!

name: Phil Berry
text: Amazing experience

name: Adrian Salas
text: Love it!

name: Nicholas Pohl
text:
Very nice fiberglass catamaran 26’ boats, completely coast guard compliant, all rigging included, modern engines.

The staff is very friendly and knowledgeable. We ran into a bad weather issue after an hour on the water, but with the fun we’d already had, we’ll be returning tomorrow morning for some fun in the sun.

I would highly recommend them if you are looking to do some exploring, play on sandbars, fish a bit… whatever.

name: Brandon Williams
text:
GREAT DAY ON THE WATER!

My family recently rented a pontoon boat from Orange Beach Boat Rentals and had a fantastic experience! From making the online reservation, payment, orientation, boat pick up, and drop off processes were super easy.  The entire staff was friendly, informative and very helpful. You can tell they love what they do. The boats were top notch and it even had a restroom.  Would highly recommend and will be back next time we're in OB!

name: Memorie Cole
text: Doug was amazing. Very helpful and accommodating. We had so much fun on the water and have already started planning our next time out

name: Ashley Allerson
text: We had a great day on the water renting a pontoon. Danny was through and knowledgeable and a super cool guy to chat with. The boat was extremely clean and well kept. Pulling back in after a full day was easy to fill up and pass the boat back over. Prices were great and we would definitely rent here again. Thanks Danny!

name: gaye mayo
text: Thank you to Orange Beach Boat Rentals for an amazing time yesterday! My family had an awesome time going to Pirates Cove, seeing dolphins and going swimming! The directions and the GPS are fantastic and having a bathroom on-board is a lifesaver! The directions and it was nice to see that Jack wanted to make sure we knew everything about the boat before we left.  Thanks again Orange Beach Boat Rentals and we can't wait to come back the next time we're in Orange Beach!

name: Karla Thornton
text: Great time, great boat and crew.  Lots of dolphins and seagulls and pelicans.  Just a beautiful day with great tunes playing.  Everyone had a nice time.  Recommend highly!!

name: kevin stutting
text: Capt Danny was awesome! Best renting experience I have had in boat renting. A rental boat with a stereo that was loud and and a 150hp motor that wasn't throttled down. These boats have a head (bathroom) that keeps everything less urgent...

name: David Naylor
text:
Best part of our vacay. First, Captains Igor and Danny are good guys who are knowledgeable, friendly and patient. The boat was immaculate and so nice having a step down bathroom!  Our dog was welcome and he loved it!  They brought fishing stuff for my son when we changed our mind last minute, and got us out on the water quick. Their recommendations of where to catch a fish and where to see dolphins were spot on!

The boat itself was easy to use and had great technology. Good sound system and excellent depth finder / gps. Boat was in tip top shape and easy to use. While I am very experienced on a boat, a beginner could use this pretty easily.

We took the four hour trip. The only problem was we should have gotten the full day rental!!!  Next time!  I will definitely rent from them again.

Final part was the gas up and check for damages. They quickly assessed the boat and saw it was in good shape. Four hours of boat time and just about $20 of gas only, so efficient as well.  No hidden fees or charges at all.

We appreciate y’all making our day so fantastic!

name: Tommie Mccool
text:
Great Rental Company

We had an Amazing day. The check-in process was very thorough and informative. The boats were Amazing and very clean. They were fully loaded with a bathroom, GPS, xm radio etc.
We saw lots of dolphins, fished for a few hours, stopped by a beautiful sandy beach island and had lunch at Tacky Jack's.  We have rented boats from all over, and this company really stands out, we were impressed all the way around. Great Boats! Great Service! Great Day!  Top Notch Service. We will be back next time.

name: Ryan Files
text: We rented one of their pontoon boats a couple of weeks ago. Fantastic experience! The boat was in great shape and they provided a map that was extremely helpful for our navigation. Everyone there was a pleasure to deal with and I wouldn’t use anyone else after such a great experience. I highly recommend!

name: natalie mrocek
text:
AMAZING DAY!

Amazing day on the water. I am so glad we decided to rent a boat for the day. We saw lots of dolphins, got to hang out on a island, go fishing and had our best day on vacation on the back bays of Orange Beach on the boat.  Customer service was Awesome. We can’t wait to rent from Orange Beach Boat Rentals again very soon. Highly recommended!

name: Richard Dias
text: Orange Beach Boat Rentals was fantastic. Captain Igor did an excellent job with boat preparation. There is a video that explains the safety features of the boat and of proper etiquette for traveling on the Inlet. Captain Igor then reviews any questions you have. Our boat was well-maintained and very clean. Our entire family had a great day on the water seeing dolphins and finally stopping at a beach. I would recommend orange boat rentals to everyone. When our family goes again no doubt where I will go to rent a boat.

name: The Nortons (Jenny)
text: Our family had a great time on the water thanks to Orange Beach Boat Rentals! Danny was very knowledgeable about the area and helpful at check in and the boat was perfect for a family! We saw so many birds and dolphin! Highly recommended!

name: ihyzey
text: We had a blast. Worth every penny. Danny was amazing. Customer service was awesome and you don't get great customer service too much anymore. You can tell they love what they do. We arrived and everything was ready to go. They made it so nice and easy.

name: Christopher McCarthy
text: Had a blast! Great training video. GPS and hand map made it SO enjoyable.

name: Natalie Whitehead
text: A great family excursion! We saw dolphins, caught fish, and had plenty of room on the boat for 5 of us. Plus, we went out in the rain, and the people at Orange Beach Boat Rentals told us to keep the boat out for a couple of extra hours no charge in order to make up for subpar conditions. We didn’t ask for it; they just kindly offered. Such great service!!

name: kenneth gossett
text: Came down here on vacation, we have used a few different boat rental places so far and we definitely saved the saved the best for last. Best boat rental by far. Very clean, very respectful and courteous staff, with top of the line boats! These guys will not disappoint!

name: Bill Knox
text: April and Capt Danny were amazing in helping us with our fishing trip.  Their prices were competitive, but their service was off the hook - much like my bait.  We will be back for more.

name: Jeff McLaughlin
text: Boat itself was very enjoyable. Family loved it. However, April whomever that may be sorely needs a class in customer service and has an issue with feeling the need to be correct. Even with a paying customer.

name: Kate Green
text: Rented a boat full day on May 19th. It was the best day we had on vacation by far. Family owned very friendly. We loved the boat super comfortable sat 6 comfortable and could have sat more. Will definitely rent again when in town.

name: Michael R
text: Wonderful Time for the Family! Thanks Captain!

name: Shell Mitchell
text:
Amazing Day! Highly Recommend!

Yesterday was our 2nd time renting with Orange Beach Boat Rentals and we love their boats and their Amazing customer service. We have rented from many other rental companies and they by far have the nicest boats. We love the convenience of the restroom and the garmin gps. The orientation is very detailed and thorough. We saw lots of dolphins, went to pirates cove and did a little fishing. Once again my families favorite day of our vacation. We highly recommend Orange beach boat rentals. Highly Recommend!

name: Heather Roaden
text: Best Day on vacation!! Kids had a blast catching fish! Customer service is amazing!!! Very clean and well maintained boats! Got to see alot of Dolphins!

name: Sydney Verant
text: I highly reccomend a full day boat rental so that you have time to go to the beach, go fishing , hit the restaurants (I reccomend pirates cove), and see the dolphins. Go to the beach earlier when there are less people and drive slowly to see the dolphins. There may be a shrimp boat throwing over their unwanted catch where the dolphins are hanging out. You can buy some shrimp right from the boat too, but dont feed the dolphins: it's illegal.

name: Sherrill Mitchell
text:
Excellent Boat rental company

We rented a boat from Orange Beach boat rentals on Saturday. We had a group of 8 and it was very comfortable. The boats were extremely clean, we loved having a restroom onboard, and they rode so smoothly. We had such a great day.  Everything about this company was professional and smooth, from booking the reservation, to being greeted and instructed during the orientation., they gave us all the local tips and recommendations, which was right on point. We highly recommend renting from orange beach boat rentals and will be back soon.

name: John
text:
Great boat rental company. Highly recommend going to Robinson Island area.. there’s lots of restaurants and bars. You can also park your boat on the sandy island just south of Robinson Island (many people go there).
The instructions and orientation of the boat is from a simple 10 minute video on an iPad they give you.

name: Debbie Mcneal
text: These guys are awesome. They give you the best service in Orange Beach. They take really good care of their equipment. Have no junk. Best boat ride and fishing trip I've ever been on. Please contact them for all your boating needs when your at beach. You want be disappointed.

name: Craig Anderson
text: Great experience! I have rented from several places in OBA, and this was the easiest by far.

name: Ryanne Riegling
text: We've rented boats from many different places and this was by far the best. Very good pricing, excellent boat! The catamaran has a bathroom in it, which was super helpful since we were out all day. The boat was outfitted with a GPS / fish finder and the company provided a very detailed map to go along with it. The gulf is quite a large area and this made it very easy to navigate.

name: Kevin Tuttle
text: Me my family had a great time anybody that complains about the $75 charge cost for running into sand bar are idiots or must be drunk  and not paying attention I had no problem  with the state-of-the-art of quipment that they supply I also went to Robinson beach but I did not beach the boat I went to the radar showed 2' and had no problem my family swam we caught fish the great thing about it was the bathroom for my small children was the excellent decision we had a great time rented for a whole day Jack the deckhand did a excellent job in explaining everything and showed great care for my children and safety I would definitely rent from them again no questions asked it was a great experience

name: Rachael Austin
text: Fantastic boat rental company! They are very thorough and make sure your boating needs are met. They provide great customer service and the boats are easy to operate and fully equipped. Will be renting from them again, hopefully soon!

name: Steve Vance
text: Great company that truly understands customer service. They went out of their way to ensure our day was trouble free and enjoyable with a very structured introduction to the boat and area. Although, the most important touch was their genuine care for my son who was sick the night before, checking on him even after our boat ride. Class acts.

name: Shqne 850
text: Had a great time! Knowledgeable staff, showed us fishing spots and where to go for some good food! Very clean boats. 10/10 I will definitely return!

name: Albert Garcia
text:
Absolutely Fantastic!!!!
We rented a boat yesterday from Orange Beach Boat Rentals, and had the BEST Day ever. Our family of 5, 2 adults and 3 kids spent most of the day at the island swimming and hanging out on the beach, the island was such a fun atmosphere, my kids played with all the other kids, we had a picnic on the beach, and got a nice tan. On our way back in we saw lots of dolphins, they are just amazing to watch, and our on private dolphin show.  Our check in process was super easy, Igor gave us a very detailed orientation and explained to us how to stay safe. The boat was Very nice, it had a full restroom, a nice stereo system, comfortable cushions a canopy to get out of the sun, our motor was super quiet and cranked on the 1st turn, in the past we rented from other companies, and their boats don't even come close to Orange Beach Boat Rentals. We can't wait to come back. We highly recommend!

name: Brenda O’Quinn
text:
Best Day Ever!

We had a Great Day. The boats were very nice. We saw dolphins, went to pirates cove and swam near the islands. The boat was very nice and had a lot of get up and go power. We were a family of 7, with 2 small kids, they napped perfect on the boat, as the back of the boat had a nice canopy and comfortable seat cushions. We couldn’t have asked for a better day on the water. We will be back in a few months and will only rent from Orange Beach Boat Rentals, as they truly are the Best.

name: Kelly Robertson
text:
Amazing Boat Rental!
We rented an 8 hour boat rental yesterday for our family of 5. It was a perfect day. Igor did our orientation he was very nice and answered all of our 150 questions. The boats were very nice and clean, the restroom was such a nice bonus. The shallow water alarm was very helpful of keeping us away from the sandbars.
We spent most of the day on Bird Island, and stopped by Pirates Cove on our way back, then finished the day watching all the beautiful dolphins.  We have rented from many companies before and Orange Beach Boat Rentals does it right. We Highly recommend them, and we can’t wait to come back and rent again.
Robertson Family

name: Emma Whitlock
text:
Amazing Boats!
We had a Great day on the water. We spent most of the day watching dolphins, swimming, fishing. The boats were perfect, very clean and had lots of extras. We loved having the restroom, the shallow water alarm kept us safe, the islands were beautiful. It was an Anazing day. We can’t wait to go again. I highly recommend Orange Beach Boat Rentals, as they made sure to cover all the details to make our day perfect.

name: Timothy Thurnes
text: Friendly and helpful staff. Equipment is clean and in great condition. We really enjoyed the experience.

name: Keila Morse
text: It was not very luxurious but they had a small toilet on board.

name: Mike
text:
These people are top notch. Very nice and informative. We took our 6 year old out and let him catch fish. Captain Egor was busy but still was more than happy to answer any questions we had. He led us right to the fish. You get a map with Fishing spots,restaurants,dolphins and other attractions that’s easy to follow. I will be renting another boat from them next time I come.
As far as the prop goes: don’t run it in the sand and you won’t be charged. Pay attention to the channel markers and the gps mapping that is provided on the boat. It only takes common sense. As a boat owner myself I know how expensive props and lower units are so I completely understand there charge for running there boat aground.

name: Marylynn Dibble
text:
Fun day on the water!!!!
My family took a boat out yesterday with Orange Beach Boat Rentals. It was a Awesome experience from the time of booking till the very end. Fantastic boats with a nice Restroom, lots of room. It had a GPS on it with a shallow water alarm which kept me away from the sandbars. We went to pirates cove and had a cheeseburger in paradise, we saw so many dolphins and had the best day of our vacation. Orange Beach Boat Rentals really made us feel welcome, and even gave us some great tips where to take our kids fishing. We have rented from several other companies and this was the Best experience we have ever had, we will defiantly be back. Thank you again, my kids will talk about this day forever now.

name: Momma Savannah
text: Awesome day on the water!!!!!  My family absolutely had the best day on the water. The boat was Great, it had a nice canopy so my kids could stay in the shade, a Full RESTROOM, which was so convenient, a stereo system which was awesome while we were parked at the islands, and lots of storage for our stuff. This was not our 1st time out with Orange Beach Boat Rentals, and we will be back again next year, Thanks Again for a Awesome day on the water..

name: Jason Easter
text:
The BEST - only rent here!

My family and I rented a boat for the day & were EXTREMELY impressed!! Such great service, attention to detail, nice clean boats & most of all personal, professional service from a husband & wife team.
