They went over in detail with us on how to operate the boat safely, understand the GPS and the shallow water alarm, and even gave us a laminated map with all the local waterfront resturants, fishing spots and where the Islands were. As another reviewer said -they have great reviews for a reason! We felt personally welcome & safe on the boat & they wanted us to enjoy our experience. We saw 24 dolphins- no kidding- all on our own as we cruised the back bay areas. Better than any dolphin cruise we have ever been on- our 2 boys (7 & 9) loved it! We rented some fishing equipment for our boys & it was perfectly prepared and on the boat for us when we arrived. Can't say enough about how impressed we were with Orange Beach Boat Rentals, as we have rented from other companies in the area and we will be back with them on our next trip to Orange Beach.  Call early to reserve as they do book up!

name: Brian Handke
text:
Awesome!!!
That is the only way this company can be described.  They go above and beyond on everything, the boats are great, the GPS is great, the maps are unbelievably detailed, the video explaining everything, Jack then went over everything again and even helped us load and unload the boat.  We rented for 8 hours and ran all the way up to Perdido Key bridge then down to Robinson Island and back and only used $40 in gas.  Got to see a bunch of dolphins, had a blast at "hermit crab island" near Holiday Harbor, and had an awesome time at Pirate's Cove, letting the kids swim while we waited on our food.  Really can't say enough good things about these folks, will definitely rent from them again when we come back!!

name: Kristy Santa Cruz
text:
Awesome Boats! We had so Much Fun!!

My family of 5 had a wonderful day on the water. The boat was spacious, very clean, and very well equipped with lots of extras, including a Restroom, GPS and large map, it even had a radio with xm radio. Much better than others that I had looked at in the area. I booked online, it was very easy, and they emailed me my confirmation, and directions.  Igor was very friendly, patient, and very informative during our orientation he explained to us how to stay off the sandbars, and gave us some great fishing tips too. We had a great, safe day on the water, we should have applied more sunscreen as we were all having so much fun and forgot.  Will definitely rent from Orange Beach Boat Rentals again. Thank you so much for such a wonderful trip! Our kids can't stop talking about how much fun they had!

name: Meagan McClain
text: Thoroughly enjoyed our time on the water, great recommendations with places to eat and where to fish and see dolphins. Pirates cove will definitely be a place that we revisit. We will be using orange beach rentals again.

name: Adam Austin
text:
I COULDN'T BE HAPPIER WITH THIS TRIP!
I called to rent a boat for me and the wife to go out for a day! Booking was easy and Captain Igor met us at the boat launch to explain boat safety and great places to explore. Rachael and I spent all day boating! Robinson Island was our fun and the water was so clear that day. We felt like we were in the Bahamas. We explored some of the bay and stopped by Pirates Cove for a drink. We loved seeing the dolphins and the sunset on the way back was beautiful. The boat was clean and in good condition. Overall, very pleased with this trip!

name: Cazes Martin
text: Our family rented a boat for the day and had a perfect time. Boat was clean and  comfortable and ran perfectly. Igor and April were very friendly, attentive and professional and were genuinely focused on assuring that we had a nice day. I've been going to the Gulf Shores area for 30 years and had never rented a boat to explore the back waters - we'll have a boat day every year from now on!

name: Monica Sands
text:
AWESOME! AWESOME! AWESOME!
We rented a boat yesterday June 8th, 2017 from Orange Beach Boat Rentals.  Everything was just Amazing, we rented some rods and bait, and they had it ready on the boat when we got there, he showed us on the map where the fish were biting the day prior and gave my son some great fishing tips.  After fishing for a few hours, we did catch and release, we ran into a group of about 15 dolphins, they were so graceful and beautiful, we had our on Private Dolphin Cruise.  We then pulled into Ingram's Bayou, which was easy to find from the map that was provided to us and we swam for a while, then went back out and watched the dolphins some more. Then we pulled up to a secluded beach and found some nice treasures to take back with us " shells, driftwood etc."  It was such a perfect day, and Igor and April was so accommodating, we felt so welcome on their boats, and they really went above and beyond in many ways. There was even a restroom on the boat! The GPS was a huge plus and the shallow water alarm kept us away from the sandbars.  So glad we found Orange Beach boat rentals, we will make this a annual trip now.  Thanks Again so much from the Sands Family!

name: Sunshine S.
text:
BEST BOAT RENTALS ON THE ISLAND!!!

Starting from the time of booking "which we did online" to the emailed instructions & directions to our orientation, then a great day on the water,  up until we unloaded from our day on the water was smooth and enjoyable. We loved the boat, the restroom was a great bonus as well as the gps which made navigation around the shallow areas easy. We spent most of the day at the islands, found some shells, did a little fishing and saw lots of dolphins. We ate lunch at Tacky Jacks, we just pulled right up on the boat and tied up, super convenient. We have been coming to Orange Beach 1-2 times a year for the last 10+ years, and we will Only rent from Orange Beach Boat Rentals from now on.  Great People and Great Boats!

name: Dusty Bias
text:
I have rented from Orange Beach Boat Rentals multiple times over the years. I have always had the best experience and really felt like we got the best bang for our buck. The boats are reliable, clean, and properly prepared to accommodate the needs of any boater.

The bays around Orange Beach can be challenging and confusing for someone who has never spent time boating in the area. Orange Beach Boat Rentals does a fantastic job giving a quick and thorough tutorial of the the local waters, preparing you for a fun and safe day boating.

name: Katy Marie Heick
text: We recently rented a pontoon boat from Orange Beach Boat Rentals and had a great experience! The reservation, payment, pick up, and drop off processes were easy peasy. Igor and Jack were friendly and definitely knew what they were doing. Would recommend and will be back next time we're in OB!

name: David Barajas
text:
This operation is phenomenal!! - No rigid fixed time slots, very accommodating and great services!

My family was in Orange Beach for a USSSA World Series torny and
my grandson had a very tight schedule..

I needed to start our day earlier than their normal time, and wanted to use the boat for 6 hours instead of their normal 4.. NO PROBLEM!

We had a great time out, saw lots of wildlife, birds, dolphins and
had a great time fishing.

Boats are clean, easy to handle, and staff is top notch!!
Made a great addition to our vacation.

If I'm ever back in this area I will definitely use them again.

Thanks to all!

name: Ron Thrift
text:
HIGHLIGHT OF OUR VACATION !!!
Thank you Igor a April for our smooth experience.
Great directions, pleasant boat orientation, clean and reliable boat
with a restroom aboard ! Map and GPS were great, XM radio jamming..
WE LOVED THE BEACHES, PIRATES COVE AND ABUNDANCE OF DOLPHINS ALL AROUND !
I am so glad that we have booked week in advance before all boats were taken. We will be back next year!
Highly recommend to any family visiting Orange Beach

name: Tomas Kratochvil
text:
Best Boat Rental!!!

Nicest boat we have ever rented, it looked like a personál boat and not a normal standard rental. The restroom was a huge bonus. Very comfortable and smooth ride. Igor was very professional and provided us with some local knowledge of where to go and we had a awesome day on the water. I will be reccomending Orange Beach Rentals to all my friends and family. Amazing day.

name: Caleb Santa Cruz
text: Very fun atmosphere! The boat was clean and comfortable. Our captain made it a very fun, safe trip and my family and I thoroughly enjoyed it. We will definitely be using A-Pair-A-Dice Charters again and I would recommend them to anyone!

name: Jackie Thurnes
text: Super friendly! Great advice on lunch, fishing and dolphin watching!

name: Archie Little
text: Great experience. Enjoyed the day. Nice friendly service.

name: Shell Mitchell
text:
Amazing Operation! Highly Recommend.

They run a top notch operation, our boat was Amazing, clean, had a full restroom, lots of other extras and a Yamaha 150hp motor that had some get up and go, these boats are Amazing unlike other rental companies who we have rented from  in the past which had 60hp motors, which were loud and smoked on us the whole time.  We saw 20 + dolphins, were able to visit Pirates Cove and the Flora Bama Yacht club in the same day, such a fun filled day, we can't wait to do it again. We will only rent from Orange Beach Boat Rentals in the future, we highly recommend them. Thank you for truly making our day Amazing.
Thank you- The Mitchells

name: Brandon barenis
text: Had a great time. The boat had very good equipment and was also very clean! There was also a bathroom on board which other rental boats we looked at didn't have.

name: Kristy Beard
text: This was our 2nd time renting from Orange Beach Boat Rentals, and it was once again a Great experience. We had such a perfect day on the water we saw lots of dolphins, went over to pirates cove, and we all got way to much sun ;)  We love their boats compared to others we have rented in the area. The restroom is super convenient, the xm radio is great, and loved the power of the 150 hp motor, and the boat rides super smooth. Once again they exceeded our expectations. They also have a great map which makes it easy to navigate. We can't say enough good things about this company, they are truly a pleasure to rent from. We can't wait to rent again and go back out on the beautiful bays of Orange Beach.

name: Talk Time
text: We were going to rent a boat, but opted for a private shrimping cruise after talking to April!  Our captain was Matt, and he was amazing!  He was a family man and very knowledgeable about the area as well as the marine life.  We got to see and touch stingrays, flounder, shrimp, catfish, squid, jelly fish, and other fish!  The dolphins swam up close to the boat and sprayed us several times!  The dolphin cruise boats followed our boat for dolphin sightings for about 5 minutes.  We also got to hang out at Pirate's Cove.  It was the highlight of our trip!

name: Wendy GODWIN
text:
Best Rentals on the Island!

Nicest boats we have found and they had power (Yamaha 150hp)  We rented the boat on Memorial Day weekend and went over to Pirates Cove it's a awesome place to visit, then we went over to the islands and the kids played and swam, and we even saw dolphins while we were there. Then we went over to Tacky Jacks on the water, and just pulled in and got out and ate lunch, that was pretty cool.  They meet us on the boat at 9am (our scheduled time to arrive) did our orientation and gave us all the pointers we needed to find the dolphins and the better fishing spots too, and fitted the kids with life vest.  We rented a few rods from him, and he had everything already on the boat when we got there.  So just to sum it up, we went fishing, stopped by pirates cove, hung out at the islands for a couple hours, ate lunch at a waterfront restaurant, saw dolphins, and my kids even napped on the ride back to the marine. We had such a fun day and can't wait to do it again.

name: Fabio Soller
text: Awesome Day on the Bay!! We had one day to play while coming to mobile and we chose to rent this boat.. it's not a pontoon but more like a small catamaran  but we had a wonderful time the boat was amazing and it had a bathroom which is a huge plus, and a really nice stereo system..  We rented fishing rods and bait and fished all over the bay.  Everything was in perfect condition and captain Igor was awesome and made sure we had everything we needed . He gave us a map so we could stop and dock the boat and eat at some of the restaurants along the bay ... on our way back in the evening the dolphins were everywhere and they were jumping and playing . We kept our distance and didn't want to disturb them but they were so beautiful to watch ...if you make the trip to robinsons island it's about a 45 min ride and it's usually busy there but it's beautiful and a great swimming area, we had a fantastic day and highly recommend Orange Beach Boat Rentals to all our friends.

name: Kacie Pipkins
text: The boat was very nice. But just like another person said in the reviews if you rent from this company be prepared to pay the extra $75 dollars for prop damage. Me and my family has owned a boat for many years and simply hitting sand one time does not damage the prop. They paint fresh red paint on the bottom of the prop and if any lil bit of paint is gone they are gonna charge you. It's a complete rip off. And just like they did on the last persons review they are gonna come onder my review and try to defend there selves. We saw this review prior to renting from this company and didn't really think any thing of it. But like I said the boat was nice and Yes it has state of the art equipment on it but that still doesn't always prevent you from bumping some sand. So be prepared to pay the extra $75 or just don't stop at any island.

resp.text:
We are very sorry about your additional cost due to running into the sand.
The reason the paint looks shiny and wet is because it’s an Epoxy paint - hardest paint known, which cures with shiny Amino blush film on top.
Most of our customers do not have issues with bumping into the sand
also we only charge the prop fee if damage is medium to severe.
We are truly sorry,  Capt. Igor

name: Israel Pipkins
text:
I was satisfied with the trip up to the point I was informed I would owe an additional 75$ due to the fact I scratched some of the red paint,  that Orange Beach Boat Rentals, had hand painted on the skeg. Which is the fin below the propeller. This is painted solely for the purpose of seeing if this fin has touched sand. Keep in mind, this is hand paint that was painted on moments before rental. Which will come off just by operating this boat. I asked exactly what damage had been done to the prop, and I was told I had damaged the (Stuff) inside the the propeller.  When asked which part? Like, shaft, bearings, gears, or seals! He was confused and only could explain that if the paint was gone the lower unit was damaged! The boat was returned in perfect working condition. But I was still charged an additional 75$. I bought this mistake. There is no need for u to do so as well. Consider someone else for your rental needs or be prepared to pay an additional 75$ God Bless! And safe travels!
It is very unfair to assume everyone that rents from you is uneducated in the operation of a boats lower unit. You see I grease my own foot, change my own water pump, and props. I service my own Yamaha outboard. I understand you are used to dealing with those who do not do these things. That's why it's only fair for me to share this to help them out before they do business with you!

resp.text:
We are very sorry about your additional cost due to running into the sand.
Yes we paint the lower part of the motor so we know if lower unit been digging thru the sand.
Your statement that we painted it moments before the rental is false. The reason the paint looks shiny and wet is because it’s an Epoxy paint - hardest paint known, which cures with shiny Amino blush film on top.
Yes we brush it on by hand, because spray-paint is 4-5 times thinner. It does not come off at all unless you drag  4000 Lbs boat thru the sand. It’s a lot of wear and tear.
Prior every departure, there is 15min orientation on video which clearly explain the operation around sandbars,
the GPS shallow water alarm and there is a special section informing you if you run into the sand there is a $75 charge. No hidden fees, everything is loud and clear upfront.
I would like to believe, We have it almost foolproof, There is GPS which color-marks shallower waters less than  6 feet in blue color, Deep water is white color. You go less than 3 feet –alarm sounds.
While cruising sandbars are bright yellow visible from a distance by untrained eye.

We specifically ask in the video to not beach the boat due to our shallow access. We ask to keep the boat floating in at least 2 feet of water with motor trimmed up.
I am sorry my helper Stahl was not able properly explain the damage of the Propeller’s  hub.
(Rubber and composite bushing between the transmission drive shaft and Prop it’s self)
This is a sacrificial part to protect $ 2,600 lower unit.  Can’t be seen by eye, it’s inside the prop.
Cost of this Power-tech hub is $ 69.00 plus $ 6.00 shipping, labor 45 min on my end – No charge.
If prop shop does it, cost is $ 280.00 .  Damage does not stop here, as the propeller work in the sand the blades loosing the cup. (ability to scoop water and go forward, start just slicing water, Rpm running high and boat does not go fast anymore). Replacement cost $ 630.00
I am losing more than you  with your damage.

You present yourself as a motor educated person and trying to help out other people.
We thank you. We are honest and we go beyond, our boats are nicest on the island.

Captain Igor

name: Jennifer Hanger-Musson
text: What a great experience.   Igor was awesome and explained everything perfectly!

name: Carol Thrift
text: What a fun day on the water. The boat was super nice, had a full restroom, nice stereo system, comfy cushions, it was by far the nicest rental we have ever rented. We went to Pirates Cove and had a bushwacker and a cheeseburger, drove around saw tons of dolphins, then went over to the island and collected seashells and played in the water. It was a pefect day, we will defiently be renting from them again, Highly recommend Orange Beach Boat Rentals!

name: Loredana N
text: booked a pontoon when showed up they  told me -its rented out they apologize but they  can give me newer one almost 200$ more then we have agreed . they acknowledge their mistake but wouldn't do anything to fix it .we were  very upset especially kids  ((((

resp.text: PLEASE DELETE THIS FALSE REVIEW!!!!  I'm Sorry, but you are mistaken, you have written this review under the wrong company, you may be speaking of OB Watersports, but we are Orange Beach Boat Rentals, we are at the Wharf Marina in Orange Beach, not Tacky Jacks area in which you are speaking of. You are not a customer of ours, or ever spent money with us.  We take payment at the time of booking, there is NO way for us to give your boat to someone else, because you have already paid for it.  Please kindly remove this false review from our company.  If your still in the area we would love the opportunity to serve your family, we promise to give you the Best Customer Service possible.

name: Jim Paar
text: Great pricing, super clean boats, and love the extra attention to details. Thank you!

name: Alison Sturtz
text: Good

name: Brenda Highfield
text: Great fun on the water clean boat

name: Orange Beach Boat Rentals
text: Great specials for Orange Beach Boat Rentals this Fall #orangebeachboatrental

name: Owen Gibson
text: 10/10 People are very nice. Today me and my father were putting our boat in and some younger folks came over and helped.

name: Mckay May
text: Have had a great experience working with Mike, Tina & Lee. Would highly recommend them to anyone!

name: Devin Gibson
text: We store our boat there.  Convenient location for us.

name: Gary Hooper
text: Nice shop great people

name: Timothy Blackmon
text: Super nice staff, helpful and patient. Took the time to answers my question and  make sure I understod thier policies. They made sure I had all the information I needed. One of the outside stuff help me cover my boat with out me asking him to help. Also very convenient location, right off 280.

name: Stephen Scouten
text: Good marina with great staff at the gas pumps. Very helpful and curteous. Boats for rent as well if needed. Clean store inside but not much gear or options. Feels like Kowlaiga Marina has a bit more options for gear and snacks, etc.

name: Trav Tindal
text: Lele and staff take great care of you. We pay the annual fee for indoor storage and get a discount off merchandise and fuel. Pick up and drop off convenient for anyone located on the northern end of Lake Martin. Just off Hwy 280 at the river bridge. We also have them handle annual detail and wax, quartly clean ups. Winter/summer-iazation, etc. Prices are competitive.

name: Jim Kutschke
text: Very professional, extremely knowledgeable, fair prices. Happy customer!

name: mark Haberstroh
text: Russell marina at river north is the worst business I've ever encountered. Everything is way over priced. Any work done will take longer then necessary and they probably won't let you know when it's done. After calling them they told me my seadoo has been ready for weeks. When I got there to pick it up it was still not ready. The staff is uninterested in being helpful. Hands down the worst business I have ever dealt with. AVOID RUSSELL MARINA RIVER NORTH!

name: B Ellis
text: Can't go wrong here. Best people on Lake Martin.

name: J. I. Bennett
text: Top notch facilities, friendly and helpful staff.

name: Doug Reid
text: Nice

name: Bob Peters
text: Awesome

name: Bill Felkey
text: Mike went above and beyond

name: joe mijo
text: Clean nice people

name: Columba L Ginez
text:
(Translated by Google) Different items good place visit

(Original)
Diferentes artículos buen lugar visiten

name: Mona Davidson
text: Drove from Tennessee on a Sunday to meet friends & rent a pontoon boat. Boat was horrible. seats were broken, awning was ripped with a big hole in it & to top it off the boat kept going dead. Called for help but was told to prime the gas line which helped but would not stay primed. Took us an hour to get back to dock cause we couldn't go very fast at all( normally shoud have take 20 mins from where we were & hadnt even been out an hour. Employees very rude & hateful. They should be ashamed to rent out such junk knowingly to 6 women & charge $349 & then be rude & disrespectful on top of that!

name: Johnathan Siebert
text: Incredibly helpful staff and great prices on their rentals. Located right on the river with amazing views and plenty of opportunity to explore. Money might not be able to buy happiness, but it can buy jet ski rentals, and that’s about as close as you can get.

name: Gregory's Garage
text: Great price and selection of rentals

name: mark hayes
text: They list online that rentals have to be returned by 4:30 but in person they change it to 4:00.  The explanation is that some people were not returning it in time and were out as late as 5:30.  So why not just charge/fine those that violate the contract.  With that logic, one should just return it at 4:30 anyway since they expect people to be late. I don't play games that way but it is wrong to reduce time under those circumstances...when you point out what the websites reads ( it reads must be returned by 4:30 ) they respond "it just needs to be updated".  Nice...

name: oxZombieQueenxo
text: Clean. Awesome and personable customer service. Delightful Hawaiian Shaved Ice served there, and the shelves are stocked with pretty practical stuff you might find yourself needing if out Camping or Fishing.

name: Carolyn Mai
text: My husband and I wanted a getaway for a few days. Wanted a boat for  fishing. Call everywhere and price was outrageous for half a day. Well happen to call here and they picked up (Google said they was open but due to winter and lack of employees they close monday) and I spoke to Mr. David!!!!! Who is very nice, sweet and had great sense of humor. Also extremely helpful. Because we only had today (MONDAY) to enjoy ourselves he was willing to come in on his day OFF to fulfill our getaway dream and let us get a platoon! This place not only have a good guy like Mr. David but they also have GREAT RENTAL PRICING! I WILL recommend to all my friends and everyone else who ask. Thank you so much Mr. David

resp.text: Thank you, we appreciate your business,  look forward to seeing you again.

name: Lara Hook
text: I would have given it 5 stars because the people were really nice and helpful but, when we got on our boot that we rented it was covered in spiders and spider webs.  I felt they could have at least cleaned up the boat.  Other than that we had a great time.

resp.text: Sorry for any inconvenience. We clean the boats & Sea-Doo's every morning, spiders built quickly on the water.

name: mike clinard
text:
Great team

Beautiful setting

name: Terry Watson
text: Ive sailed with B.J,3 times,this man knows the waters like nobody else,with 30 years experience on the water,i trust anything he does,all 3 trips on his sailboat have been remarkable and id recommend him over anybody.And ive never known BJ to be unprofessional,crybabies will leave untrue reviews on here because thats what they do to everybody,im not friends with BJ,I live in Kansas City,but everytime i go to Orange beach,i go out on his ship and always have a great time,in fact i'll be there the first week of October,21 and hope to rent the ship for a private sunset tour.

name: Josephine Gilbert
text: Captain BJ was very friendly and down to earth.  He planned a great trip for us with Jamacian music, cool drinks, dolphin siteings and a swin in the warm waters.  Loved it.

name: Leah LeBlanc
text: Unfortunately I cannot leave a review about the actual experience of the trip. I would’ve loved nothing more than to leave a glowing review had my group and I actually gotten to go on the 2 hour cruise I’d booked with this company. I can only relay my experience of dealing with an extremely unprofessional company. We were ecstatic about our cruise and as soon as we arrived I started calling the number of our captain who I had been in contact with since booking. We stood at his boat for nearly 40 minutes waiting for him and he never showed up. I called 4 times and left voicemails and still no response. Our group drove an hour from where we are staying to get there. I cannot get over how unprofessional this company is. Don’t waste your time and money.

name: Brett Saunier
text: This crew is top notch.  I can't say enough about how good Captain B.J. and his crew member John were with our family.  He made sure the kids were happy and safe while he let them raise the sails, drop the anchor, and even steer a little.  The water was beautiful and so the dolphins even joined us for a bit. There is nothing like sailing the Daedalus.

name: hayley skelton
text: BJ was VERY unprofessional. We had this booked months ahead of time and we were called the day before and told the boat was having maintenance issues. He ended up putting a group of 14 people (not including the driver) on a pontoon boat. We showed up the next day and BJ was nowhere to be found. He basically "hired" another person to take us out and failed to mention it. I would not recommend this to ANYONE. Save your money and take it somewhere else!

name: Caroline Lee
text: If I could leave zero stars, I would. DO NOT book through this company. BJ was the most unprofessional person I have ever dealt with. We called to confirm the trip (which was booked in May) the day before we were supposed to go on the cruise and after he called us back hours later, he did confirm that we would be ready to go at 11 am the next morning. Later in the evening he called and said the sailboat was having maintenance issues, but to not worry because he had a bigger, 20 person sailboat that we could take. Next day comes, we load up our coolers and take ubers to the marina. BJ is no where to be found, but we were 15 minutes early so we did not think anything about it. After talking with the employees at the marina we discover that this is not the first time he hasn't showed up for a trip. Also, his boat was not licensed for more than 6 people, and we had 8 (which he knew when we booked). He apparently has gotten in trouble with the coast guard and may have lost his boating license all together??? And lastly, the man did not even have another boat. He called us the night before saying we had a plan b, when he had absolutely no intention on showing up the next day. The only redeeming factor this man has it that he did refund us the money we paid. DO NOT BOOK WITH BJ, he won't show up and if he does, you will be riding illegally with him.

name: Amanda Mobley
text: Booked the sunset cruise, they called and cancelled about 30 minutes before due to weather but rescheduled for the next day.  Understandable.  Drove to the marina to board the next day and it started to storm.  Called and texted to see if they were still sailing and no response.  No offer to reschedule, etc... Do yourself a favor and sail with another company.

name: Alanna Bishop
text: Do NOT book through this company. We had a bachelorette trip planned MONTHS in advanced with BJ to use his sail boat. He would never return phone calls like he said he would. We had 14 girls for our sail. He informed us the day before that his sail boat was having maintenance issues, but that he had a “party barge” for us to use. We show up for this and BJ is no where to be found. He has hired someone else to take us out on a pontoon boat. This pontoon should have never had 14 people plus a driver on.  The driver of this pontoon also told us that BJ had taken another group of people out on his boat? However, people at the “shop/office” hasn’t seen BJ in weeks? This was very unprofessional and no way to handle a business. We spent a lot of money on this trip and he never offered to reimburse us anything.

name: Carie Andrews
text: Had a great time out with the Daedalud crew! Very relaxing afternoon on the water.

name: Matt Miller
text: A really fun trip at a great price. We will definitely come back next year!

name: Amber Dudley
text: Professional crew. They're down to earth and offer a very beautiful sailing experience.

name: Jeremy Tapp
text: Nice slow sail with a corny Captain. YouTube music about sailing and cheap wine.

name: chuck causey
text: They cancelled on us 15 minutes before we were supposed to sail on the last day we were in town! Also said this was a 50 ft. boat but was probably 30 ft. Very unprofessional! Would not recommend

name: Cathy Weaver
text: Finally spoke to a gentleman who said he would call me back to schedule. Really!?!

name: Anne Kunkel
text: My 2sons and husband said it was the greatest time they have had he years! Mike was a great captain! They can’t wait to go back out! Caught lots of fish!

name: Michael Andress
text: Great people and accommodations we took 25 of our employees out on the 6hr trip and caught the limit on Snapper. I highly recommend Captain Mikes!

name: Daniel Paul
text: This was a great charter! They have a very large boat and the crew was a lot of fun to be around.  We caught our limit in Red Snapper and a few game fish/sharks as well.  I would definitely recommend them!

name: Debbi Smith
text: Our fishing trip with Capt. Mike and his first mate, King, was the highlight of my week at the island.  They definitely know where to put you on the fish.  The boat, the Lady Ann, is a big, fine vessel and her crew has everything you need to enjoy your fishing trip.  I sure hope I get to fish with them again.  Capt. Mike and King were the best.  They are professional, friendly, courteous, and definitely know where to find fish.  I highly recommend you book a fishing trip with them.

name: Jeff Hoehn
text: You could not ask for a more honest Captain on your fishing trip! We had a great trip only because of his honesty and integrity. We passed on a 2 day due to weather on his request and we are sooo glad we did. We did a one day instead and it was amazing. He has his customers best interest at heart not their money and that’s very hard to find these days! Thanks Captain Mike and mates King and Trey for an awesome trip.

name: Demico Thomas
text: I had a blast with this charter! Awesome staff, excellent experience!

name: Loren Steen
text: My experience with Capt Thierry left me with high regard for this man and his business.  He's a professional and a gentleman.

name: Jamie Lane
text: Would 100% recommend Captain Mike and his crew to everyone!   Captain Mike, Captain King and Trey were awesome guides and we had great fishing all day!  Could not ask for a better experience! Thank you for everything!

name: lance stewart
text: Had a great time fishing with Captain Mike, Captain King, and deck hand Trey. They are very polite and safety is their first priority.

name: Denise Keaton
text: We had one of the best fishing trips with Capt. Mike and crew.  The camaraderie with our friends was awesome.  I highly recommend fishing with Capt. Mike and look forward to doing this again.  The fun started before we left the dock and never stopped.  Capt Mike - YOU 'DA MAN!

name: Carolyn Owens
text: My Mom and I sent my husband, father, and 7 yr old son out for a morning of deep sea fishing for Father's Day and their birthdays.  It was my son's first time deep sea fishing and the crew was phenomenal. They had an absolute blast and came back already planning their next trip out.  Thank you so much for the memories!

name: Jenny Adams
text: The week of March 23, five of us took a private charter with Captain Mike and Josh.  The crew was professional, courteous, and extremely knowledgeable.  Captain Mike was determined to find a good fishing hole and he succeeded.  We caught plenty, released some, and had a fantastic time.  Josh, our deck hand, worked assisting with bait, equipment, and encouragement. It was a day my children and I will never forget.  I without hesitation recommended Captain Mike. Miss Ann, and support staff.  When we return, we will look up the Captain!!!

name: bruce burgess
text:
I have fished with Captain Mike's for 5 years and I would NEVER go fishing in the area unless I was on one of their boats.

The Captains do their absolute best to put you on the fish, and the crew is always fantastic.

If you want the full experience, plan on booking and overnight, or even a 3 day trip. You will not regret it.

Please note, while this company is amazing, they cannot control the weather or federal and local fishing regulations. My experience is that even if the weather gets in the way, Captain Mike's will do their best to accommodate your needs.

name: Griffin Hornsby
text: My dad and I went last Sunday.  I grew up deep sea fishing with my dad on his boat and had never been on a chartered boat.  The captain, the deck hands, and the whole experience was awesome.  Very kind staff and great experience.  I am looking forward to taking another trip this summer.

name: Keith Parrett
text: Great fishing trip! Everyone was great, from capt. mike to the deck hands. They work very hard to make sure you catch fish and are taken care of the entire trip. We had a group of 9 people and went on a 10 hour trip. We had pleanty of room to all fish at once and caught a variety of fish. The boat is in great shape and well taken care of. Thanks for the great time.

name: Misty Wilson
text:
My husband went snapper fishing on The Escape . He says:
Skipper kept us on fish the whole time.  Everyone caught a limit of red snapper early on, which left plenty of time to catch a mess of vermillions. The deck hands were attentive and knowledgeable.  My only complaint: some of the rigs were not well-maintained, needed to be retied, etc.
All in all, a great trip for the price.

name: Shaun Mulhall
text: Captain Skipper produced an awesome trip like always.  He works to get you on the fish.  His deck hands are personable, polite gentlemen.  Thanks again for the great tuna trip!

name: Brad Reinking
text: We used Captain Mike, King and Shelton for our fishing adventure and it was AWESOME!  All that I expected!  Great crew and caught our limit of Red Snapper even throwing some back!  Highly Recommend!

name: Sharon Bishop
text: Capt'n Mike is a legend in charter boat fishing, according to most people who know him. He can put you on fish! His crew, King and Grant make you fill comfortably and safe aboard Lady Ann. They are hardworking polite and professional gentleman. Fish for dinner!

name: Chad Hughes
text: I had a lot of fun on This fishing trip and I will go back they explained everything and they help you they even cleaned the fish just for a couple bucks. Thanks skipper for the great experience.

name: Albert Becker
text: Pure DISAPOINTMENT! We have booked a deep sea fishing trip four times and did not go out even once. In the beginning it was always the weather, at least we were told that it was too windy to go out but for sure it was not, at least it was not windy that it would have been a safety issue, maybe little shaky. After one day-before canceled trip and one last-minute (we were already on the boat!) we figured out that the problem was more that Captain Mike did not want to go out with only few people, I guess not profitable enough. I am sorry but in such a case I have to give a negative review, if you want your business to survive you have sometimes to do also the less profitable tours, just to keep customers coming and talking about your business. NEVER AGAIN, waste of my time.

name: Robert Pergler
text: Great day, great fun, great crew, great catch, what more could you ask for?

name: Christopher Thompson
text: Thanks but more importantly it was an awesome experience.

name: Joey Belmont
text: Great Boat, Great Captain, Great Crew!!!

name: Milo Gavin
text: Well run.

name: Juan1t0
text: awesome like always!

name: Mickeal Nelson
text: Awesome

name: Leah Creighton
text: Take my oldest for her bday they lived it. They even got to drive the boat they that was the coolest part. 😂

name: Guadalupe Nash
text: Ahhhh, I miss Dolphin Cruise Aboard Dolphin Tales. Prime people watching spot in a great little park. Love grabbing an iced coffee and venturing over here to chill out for a little while. There are tons of dogs running around, families, lots of variety with excellent views. One thing to note, for people coming here for the first time is that there's generally A LOT of weed around. Maybe make a friend and partake - who knows? Definitely love this spot.

name: Ice Dog
text: Fun time.   5pm cruise.    Lots of dolphins.   Everyone onBoard seem to have a lot of fun.   Super nice and friendly people operating the cruise.  Would do it again and highly recommend.

name: Danny Embry
text: Incredible morning dolphin watching and cruising the bayou. Had a great time with Tabby and Capt. Bart.

name: Katie Eickman
text: This cruise was awesome! We saw lots of dolphins, the people running it we're interactive, fun, great with involving kids and informative. It was so relaxing. I would definitely go again. It made my son's year! :)

name: Alisha Wheat
text: We called the day of and was able to get a snorkeling cruise.  The lady that answered the phone was so sweet!  On the cruise the Captain was very cool and answered all our questions.  Great price and very friendly!!

resp.text: Alisha, thank you for the kind words and the awesome 5 star review! These reviews encourage us so much. You are like the cheering squad that keeps us going. We sure appreciate you taking your time to leave this review and we hope to see you again aboard Dolphin Tales! Happy Blessings to you and your family until then.

name: Chris Pittson
text: We enjoyed the 5pm sunset dolphin cruise. Nice modern boat.  Only takes 24 passengers. It has room for more so it wasn't crowded.  Captain was super nice and informative. Saw plenty of dolphins which was the point. Excellent!

resp.text: Thank you so much for the great review! We enjoyed having you! So glad you enjoyed your cruise!!

name: Yareli Tena
text: We had a an absolute amazing time. The staff was friendly and even offered directions by text. The captain allowed our kids to steer the boat and we saw the dolphins for a generous time.

name: Kyle Knell (Kyle Von Clausewitz)
text: Our cruise started slow, but ended with lots of dolphin the closer we got to sunset. We had 9 people, ages 11 & up and everyone was entertained.  Captain Bart and Tammy were friendly and interactive and it was a great bargain.  They definitely made our day.  Bring some money for a tip. :)

resp.text:
Kyle, Thank you so much fun the 5 star review! Capt. Bart & I do our best to provide you with a fun and informative cruise. It’s so kind of you to remind others to bring tip money, and we do appreciate the gratuity.
Please come back to cruise with us again and try a Blue Angels or a Snorkel excursion, or just another dolphin cruise- as every cruise every day is totally different. We spot different dolphin on different days. 🐬 My southern accent must have been extra thick that day. We don’t have a deck hand named Tammy, but we do have me- I am Tabby and I appreciate you taking the time to give us a good review.

Until we meet again, kind regards,

Tabby & Capt. Bart

name: Carolyn Park
text: Best dolphin experience ever! Lots of dolphins, great guide with time and attention given to detailing interest of passengers. We saw shrimp fishermen casting nets and plenty of dolphins feeding, while birds and pelicans flocked alongside. Mid tour we enjoyed the fireworks and yacht lights at The Wharf at the intracoastal waterway. My family loved every minute. Family operated and well maintained.

name: Ryan Hall
text: We had a great time on the early morning dolphin cruise. The captain and his wife were VERY knowledgeable about the habits and life of the dolphins. They even had names for some of them! Answered all of our questions about the dolphins and shrimp boats. They had a life vest for my 2 year old and snacks and drinks for sale on board. I really liked how they are a family business and you can't beat the price! I highly recommend this cruise for young families looking for a fun local activity

name: Lorri Rhodes
text: 2 trips & LOVED both! One with my 3 year old and he and I both LOVED it! They even let him think he was driving the boat, which was a huge hit. Then I went during the Winter with a group of Winter Guests. We saw a few dolphin that time of year even though it was pretty cold. Plus we saw Pelicans diving for bait and deer on the back bay. Great outdoor experience for all ages!

name: Louise Whitney
text:
We had the most amazing afternoon aboard Dolphin Tales. We enjoyed a mid-day cruise on this comfortable boat. It was chilly, and they even offered us blankets & they have these nifty roll down clear curtains that totally block the chilly air. I don't know how anyone rides on one of the open boats during the spring. This ride was much more enjoyable than others I've been on while vacationing here.
This is the best cruise in town!

name: Betty Meeks
text:
This is the best dolphin cruise I've taken.
The boat is so comfortable & relaxing.
Nice cool ride with a top over the whole boat.
I'm a senior citizen & I appreciate the easy on/off accessibility of the boat. The bathroom on board is a nice amenity too.

name: Dan Valcarcel
text: Great fun and worth every penny! We saw dolphins, yes, but more than that enjoyed a magical time in the boat. Super friendly pilot...great with the kids. He even went back to fish out my son's shoe that fell in the water. A great highlight of our stay in Orange Beach. Highly recommended.

name: S Klasing
text: What an experience! We loved it! Please take cash aboard to tip your captain. ( I had no idea about tipping and felt like a butt when everyone tipped at the end of the cruise).. He's great and doesn't worry about going a little over the time limit to ensure you have the best time possible.. ( Or maybe we just got lucky being the last crew of the day). A must do!!!!

name: Billy King
text: Great time with our family of 6. Saw many dolphins. Was able to take our own cooler and snacks.  Entire trip was 1.5 to 2 hrs.  Bart was very friendly and knowledgeable.  Will use them again!!

name: Paula Grimes
text: My family came to Gulf Shores from Kentucky last year and we took the dolphin tales cruise and loved it! This year we came back and haven taken two cruises with them. They are very friendly and we always see dolphins. We enjoy the cruise very much!!

name: Apolinario Casarez
text: Awesome dolphin sighting trip. Very friendly captain and crew. Our trip went a little longer than two hours due to being determined to see dolphins. When we finally saw some we saw many. Great tour and will return.

name: Tabitha Bowers
text:
HOME OF THE $10 DOLPHIN CRUISE!!!!! FAMILY FRIENDLY PRICES. SHADED BOAT. BATHROOM ON BOARD. PADDED SEATS. GREAT CAPTAIN AND STAFF!
A PERFECT CRUISE WITHOUT BREAKING THE BANK.

name: Erin Breuker
text: What a fun tour! Laid back and casual, we were allowed to keep our shoes on! Captain Bart and Tabi were kind and accommodating as well as knowledgeable. Can't be the price and the experience was great. Saw plenty of Dolphins and Dolphin Tales are respectful to the Dolphins. Strongly recommend!

name: Wes Singleton
text: My Wife and I had a great time, and saw many dolphins on our sunset cruise.  Captain Bart and his wife Tabitha were very kind and welcoming.  I was looking for a less crowded, smaller boat, and this fit the bill.

name: Hank Mastalerz
text: Turned out to be a great trip with a lot of great dolphins along the entire way. The crew was very nice and made the experience great, especially with the knowledge and insights they shared. Definitely recommend for anyone for a great morning or afternoon.

name: Faye Pendergrass
text: On a recent girls trip to the beach we chose to take the Dolphin Tales Cruise.  It was the highlight of the trip.  The boat was great and comfortable.  We felt so "at home" with the crew and their attention to detail.  Hope to go again when we get back to the area.

name: Amanda Beavers
text: Our family had a blast yesterday on the 5:30 Dolphin Tale cruise! We saw A LOT of dolphin's & made some beautiful pictures! Captain Bart & Mrs.Tabitha were wonderful!!!! Thank you both for an amazing experience!

name: Ricky Johnson
text: Great experience! Nice that it was a husband /wife team.  Made it more personal.  We got to see plenty of Dolphins.  Not a bad view on the boat,  with great comfortable seats with plenty of space to roam the boat.

name: DeSoto's Restaurant
text: We have had a wonderful time while dolphin cruising with Dolphin Tales. It is a great boat run by nice people. They will even book private excursions. The sunset cruise was amazing.

name: Jeri Ann
text: The boat was great!  There isn't a bad seat and the canopy keeps you protected from the sun.  They also circle around the dolphins so everyone gets a good look.  You definitely can't beat the Monday Madness price!!!  It's a must see!

name: Ricky Johnson
text: Great experience! Nice that it was a husband /wife team.  Made it more personal.  We got to see plenty of Dolphins.  Not a bad view on the boat,  with great comfortable seats with plenty of space to roam the boat.

name: Jeri Ann
text: The boat was great!  There isn't a bad seat and the canopy keeps you protected from the sun.  They also circle around the dolphins so everyone gets a good look.  You definitely can't beat the Monday Madness price!!!  It's a must see!

name: Christine McFarling
text: I went with my grand children and we loved it. The have snacks for sale and they know a lot about the animals. We will be coming back!

resp.text:
Thank you so much for such a kind review. Your review of what we do daily is precise, true and correct.

Best Regards

Tabby & Capt. Bart

name: christy Daniel
text: This was a great trip and the people are very friendly.  It's the best dolphin cruise in Orange Beach.  We've been on several and we will definitely come back to Dolphin Tales.

name: Stephen Hayden
text: A great deal and such nice owners! We had a blast on this tour. We saw many dolphins too!

name: Zach Wagner
text: We tried to book the cruise for the day we wanted and everything was fine until the receipt printed and showed a date more than a week away. We called the company to find out how we could book the trip for another day or what our options were and all we got were rude, snide remarks from the owner saying that "It was your fault because the computer always asks what day you want." The only solution was to process a refund and charge a 20% fee due to their error. You would think that when you work in the tourism industry, your customer service would be a little better.

resp.text:
Hi Zach,
I checked my manifest and don’t have a customer in the history of 4 years worth of manifest since the inception of this business with a first or last name matching the name you used here. I am sorry for what you endured and there is a company in town using a very similar name as mine.
I wish you well.
One thing I am not is”rude”, so I am very confident you did not speak to me.
Hope you are having a better day.

Best wishes,

Tabby

name: Deena Powell
text: Awesome tour. Very friendly staff. We highly recommend.  We started seeing dolphins shortly after we left dock and continued seeing them throughout the trip.

name: Tori Navigator
text:
We cruised last weekend and had a blast!
Dolphin Crusing for $10 cannot be beat!
We prefer the Dolphin Tales boat and can't wait to come later in the summer and go out on the smaller boat.
Captain Bart & Tab always give a 5 star experience.

name: Brianna Edler
text: One star is being considerate. Back in August we tried to take the Dolphin Tales sunset cruise. There was 14 of us, who drove an hour out for the cruise. We were told to arrive at 5:30 to board at 6 for our sunset dolphin cruise from 6-8pm. After 6:00 came and went we were wondering where the boat was. No communication from the company. After posting a review saying they were a no show and we were disappointed, they contacted us and said there was an emergency in the family. They said if we REMOVED our post we would be given 6 certificates. We removed the post. This week we tried to book our makeup trip for tonight (Sunday Feb 18th) we were told to be at a different place at 2:30 for our 3-5 sunset cruise. We arrive at 2:45 (we took 4 cars all driving an hour away). Again. No boat. We call the company and they said they already left, they left at 230 for the 3pm cruise.

name: Ashley Yanosky
text: Lovely dolphin tour hosted by a husband and wife team with true southern hospitality. Family and budget friendly. We will definitely be back.

name: Brian Harvey
text: Family friendly, very accommodating, reasonable prices.  Went with 4 kids five and under, they had a blast.  Captain Bart even let them drive.  Definitely would go again.

name: Kasey Blanks
text: We took our 3 yr old son it was nice friendly people it was Monday they off a good deal made reservations thru the Facebook page that linked me the there page. Easy to find it was rainy but they boat ride was nice and we seen dolphins! Comfortable seating and the boat had a roof! I definitely recommend going.

name: Valerie Smyder
text: Warm & welcoming husband & wife team. Byob, no restrictions on alcohol. Toilet on boat, mostly shaded! Especially loved their eco-friendly, dolphin-friendly approach... we saw a lot of beautiful & natural dolphin activity without inciting unnecessary (& sometimes dangerous) thrill-seeking behavior from the dolphins. Hosts were full of information about dolphins, other creatures & local sites.

name: Timothy Gardner
text: If I could give 6 stars I would! We made a mistake and went to Orange Beach to the wrong company. Made contact with them and they said they would wait. We had no time to spare to make it to Perdido Key, FL. We showed up 15 minutes after the scheduled cruise was supposed to start. They went out of there way to come pick us up at the dock. Welcomed us onboard and we had a great time. Very informative crew! We loved it!

name: Christopher Newton
text: Do not recommend, bad customer service, no one can give you a straight answer, the staff were rude, the area and boat was dirty. Do yourself a favor and go elsewhere.

name: Kevin Mccarty
text: My family had an amazing time! The kids loved how close we were able to get to the dolphins. I'll ve uding thrm again!

name: Ericka Wheeler
text: This tour was the most memorable part of our trip to orange beach this summer! Loved the island, the ride, and of course the dolphins! I'm not sure who had more fun, the kids or adults ;-)

name: Charlie Wilson
text: This is a great cruise!!!  The Dolphins came right up to our boat and it was so cool!  Definitely choose this one!

name: Joe Cerven
text: Excellent way to spend an afternoon.  Numerous sightings and smooth ride despite windy/choppy conditions.  Great hospitality as well!

name: Dialyn Powers
text: I know you have a lot of choices but the smart one is this dolphin cruise. My friends and I never stopped laughing. Make sure you add it to you To Do list. I swear the owner must be a dolphin whisper.

name: Independent Posts
text: An unforgettable experience on the Dolphin cruise! Lovely crew, too! Strongly recommend!

name: Cat Huss
text: Great trip. Friendly people. LOADS of dolphins!!! Super trip. We plan to book again soon!!

name: Errol Jones
text: They had rescheduled us on a different time slot the day before and I did not get the text until an hour before the cruise. They would not provide us with a refund. After standing in the hot sun for over an hour they offered us a ride on a sail boat without any shade. The kids would have been toasted. What ever happened to customer service? The lady on the phone was loud and rude!

name: Desiree Johnson
text: Shaded with padded seats. Very family friendly! Had a great time!

name: karen wilder
text:
Bored, idled  forever, no information about dolphins or area, no music, deck of boat was dirty, no laughs, peoples kids got bored and fussy, worse dolphins  cruise I have ever been on, even the captain looked untrue sky
They dont even check for payment!
Pay a few bucks more for alot more fun!!

resp.text:
Karen,
I checked my manifest for 37 weeks ago, and even went back 4 years, and could not find your name. I have no clue which boat you actually cruised on, but I believe you were on another boat.
My mother (aka my best friend/right arm) died last season and two weeks later, I was back on the water, trying to give my customers a great dolphin experience. There has never been a day that we don’t bring forth our “A” game, and put aside any personal issues we might have- including the death of a loved one.
I’m sorry for what you went through on someone’s boat, but I am confident it wasn’t mine.
And as far as checking for payment....if you cruised with someone without paying...shame on you.
We all (all dolphin cruises) work very hard and occasionally, due to most customers paying online prior to the cruise, and no need to “check for payment”, we/any cruise company miss collecting and if you did not speak up, SHAME one you. What are you trying to accomplish by announcing that on a public forum?
Are you encouraging others to stiff us too? Wow. That speaks volumes.
P.S.
There is another company in town who copied my business model, and had a very similar name as me. Perhaps you cruised with them.
Either way, I hope you find what you’re looking for in life, because it’s pretty sad to leave a small business such a stinking review.

Kind Regards

Tabby

name: Brittney Franklin
text: We had a great time with our family! We got to see the new baby dolphin too!

name: Steve Honican
text: If you are in Gulf  Shores this is the best tour around. Captain Bart will put you next to the Dolphins.

name: Stephen Masterson
text: Dolphin Tales - think great views, great people, great guides and a wonderful time! Love these guys!

name: Alissa Luciani
text: We took the cruise and snorkel trip. It was the highlight of our vacation there were 7 of us and we couldnt wait to do it. The boat was comfy and shaded  the island we snorkeled at was beautiful we found a starfish and hermit carbs. The family enjoyed theirselves and thats hard to do with ages ranging from 8 to 40. But it was an experience we will not soon forget. Would definitely do again. Thank you for helping us make great memories.

name: Mandy Sims
text: Captain Bart was fun and very good with getting kids involved.  Lots of fun!

name: Ashley Imperato
text: What a beautiful experience! I highly recommend.

name: Sarah Mathes
text: This is the best and friendliest cruise out there, can't wait to go again !!!

name: Emily Stutts
text: We had a wonderful cruise!!! Very enjoyable and saw lots of daulphins!

name: Mylan Mitchell
text: Great Experience! Highly recommend?

name: HK K
text: Great cruise with friendly staff who go the extra mile! Greek friendly during spring break!

name: Tim Carn
text: Our friends at Dolphin Tales always take great care of our guest!

name: Brian N Kim Collins
text: Had a wonderful time, great hospitality thanks everyone

name: Nicole Freeman
text: Seen tons of dolphins! Great eexperience HIGHLY recommend!!!

name: Agustin Tena
text: I will never bring my family and friends here again. The place is dirty and customer service terrible.

name: Rebekah Newton
text: One star because I can’t rate any lower. Property was disgusting, captain was so rude, ship was dirty, and it’s so poorly managed. Would never recommend anyone come here.

name: Amanda VanCappellen
text: Very friendly and knowledgeable!  Great tour for all ages!!!!

name: Jason Severson
text: Great captain and fun experience!

name: dave bonds
text: Blue angle trip was awesome!

name: peggy lindsay
text: Great family experience, fun times

name: Patricia Louagie
text: Had an awesome time.

name: Linda Baker
text: Dolphin Tales is our favorite thing to do .

name: Jennifer Morgan
text: Wonderful experience!

name: Christopher Rider
text: Excellent.

name: Zach Adams
text: We saw dolphins

name: alberto siller
text: No hassle rental. Boat was in as new condition and very clean. Very easy check in and checkout. Tyler was very friendly and easy to deal with. Very good experience and would definitely recommend this boat to anyone.

name: Eva Lord
text: Thank you to Wahoo Water-sports once again! We had an amazing day on the beautiful brand new pontoon boat we rented for the day in Orange Beach. The owner helped us himself to make sure everything was perfect for our day on the water. He provided a map of the area and made suggestions of where we should go for the day. We will definitely be renting from him again when we come back in July. Thank you!!!

name: Cyndi Montgomery
text: We rented two pontoons with a large group and had a great time. The staff were very helpful and communicative. The dolphins were a hit!

name: Olga Ascione-Spittle
text: I highly recommend Wahoo Watersports. Brooks who is the owner was so accommodating and had great recommendations for us too. He has beautiful new clean pontoons. We will be back!!

name: Mike Rogers
text: On Tuesday before Thanksgiving I called Wahoo and requested a Pontoon Boat for my family to tool around the Bay for the afternoon. I had called several other places but they were either booked, didn't sound interested at all, or were very rude. Brooks at Wahoo talked to us like a personal friend, fixed us up with a brand new pontoon and treated us like royalty when we arrived. We loved the boat. It was so nice and roomy and we just had the most incredible time. We took food aboard, fished a little, spent time looking at all the porpoises following us and came in about 5 p.m. with the joy of an incredible family time together.  My daughter replied, "Best day ever, Dad!!!" Such a special thanks is in order to Brooks who made this day so special for us.  Forget about all the other places that promise you the moon.  Ole Brooks delivered!! We will be back next year and the first place we will call to book our boat will be Wahoo Watersports. Did I mention that it was incredible?  Well, it was!!

name: Kathy Coleman
text: I called on a Tuesday afternoon and was able to rent a pontoon for a Thursday afternoon for 4 hours.  When we arrived they were ready for us and quickly took care of the business side then showed us how the boat worked, filled up the gas tank and got us on our way.  Boat was spacious and comfortable and we had a great time!  We asked for recommendations on what to see and they were very helpful.  Price was very reasonable and fuel was included which was helpful in knowing our final price!  Both employees were very nice and we are ready to go back next year on our vacation!

name: Shaun Ek
text: This is a nice little rental shop and overall I thought it was great. They took my reservation over the phone with no hassle, and even with only one day notice I was happy they had availability. They gave simple training and were friendly. The only thing I didn't like was that it takes almost 15 minutes from their beach to get out of the no wake zone, so that is a really significant chunk of time going super duper slow, so be aware of this if you plan to rent a wave runner for only one hour, you'll only have a bit over 30 minutes of actual fun time on the water.

name: Mark Austin
text: Had a great time with my wife, son and a few buddies. Very relaxing ride out to the gulf. The Captain and crew were very friendly and made sure we were taken care of. Fish on! We took back several fish and cooked up a small feast. Very delicious. Great time with the family.

name: breanne ballard
text: We rented jet skis for or first time through this company. We loved every minute of it! They explained everything thoroughly from how to use the skis to the map. Great prices and the guys helping us were great. Will definitely be going back!

name: Chad Hinders
text: I called on Monday and was able to reserve a pontoon for the next Sunday. The boat was ready to go and worked perfect for my family. The location is easy to get to and has easy access to great boating spots. Will be going back for our next rental!

name: Heidi Vallee
text: Brooks was helpful and easy to work with. Great experience touring the bay. Reasonable rate that included gas. Boat was ready right away- walk right up and we were off. Thank you!

name: Jennifer Madere
text: I can’t really say how the place was because the day before our rental we received a phone call that they have to cancel our reservation. I asked if they could assist with locating another place for us since we were out-of-towners. I received a call back about an hour later saying the rental was back on. We were very excited to get that call. The next day, morning of, on our way to the place we received another call saying our reservation was again cancelled. Just enough to ruin what we figured would be the highlight of our family trip. Very disappointed :(

name: Caitlin Marie
text: Super great service - called about a week before the 4th of July and they were able to rent us a pontoon boat. Nothing majorly fancy but it wasn’t janky either. It was perfect. Very friendly staff. We brought our super well bagged dog on board. It was such a fun time. We will definitely be using their services again in the future when we visit our favorite spot in Alabama.

name: Leigh Anne Bennett
text: Great prices and spectacular boat ride!!! Staff was friendly and helpful! A wonderful day on the Bay!

name: Bill Shumate
text: I had so much fun with our pontoon boat.  Reasonable rate and awesome deals on jet skis.

name: Carl Streeval
text:
This place is the one you want to rent from. Prices are the cheapest in the area, and the minimum time (1.5hrs) which turned to 2hrs is longer then everywhere else.
The staff are very helpful, I was able to call them several times while out on the water for directions and questions. Also the jet skis are very fast. You wont be dissatisfied with your rental or experience. Highly recommend

name: Anthony S
text: We had a great day with our boat rental from Wahoo. Very helpful and friendly staff and good prices in comparison with the area, especially since fuel is included in the price so there's no guessing game at the end. I would highly recommend them to anyone looking to rent a boat.

name: Chris Oubre
text: Great owner. We had such a fun time. This owner went the extra mile, helping us with navigation and fishing spot locations. He even looked over our bait and gave us more appropriate lures.  This is the only place that I will ever rent a boat from again when I’m in Orange Beach.

name: Kelly Gomez
text: We had a great time on our pontoon boat rental! We loved that we were able to bring our own fishing gear and head out on our own adventure exploring the waters! We will definitely be back on our next trip to the beach!!

name: Tristin Miller
text: Very good staff and the jet skis were well maintained.   Fair priced and personable.  Will definitely be back and recommend to others

name: Jason Hitt
text: Great experience with Wahoo Watersports!! Brooks was extremely friendly and streamlined  in setting up our rental. And Tyler gets you in and out with a great personality! Awesome rates and they cover the gas which is an awesome perk!!

name: Michael Bearden
text: Best customer service experience I have had in the area! Great watercraft and flexible scheduling! They really go above and beyond to make sure you have the best experience possible. Ask for Tyler!

name: Shelby C
text: Love them dolphin cruise guarantee to see dolphins more than one well worth it me and my family loved it very good price. The captain let them Drive the boat!

name: Jeannie Darnell
text: We had a great time. Capt. Brooks is the best. He had us on fish in no time. The boat was nice, clean, and well maintained. We will definitely book with him again. Highly recommend him!

name: Ike Chimbandi
text: We rented a pontoon boat. Great price & extremely friendly service. We will be back, Thank you!!

name: T. Keith Hollis
text: Great service, great pontoon. Very helpful folks. No hassle rental. Highest recommendation.

name: Dennis Morgan
text: Great customer service and delivered exactly what we needed.  Rented a 24' pontoon boat for four hours and was the best price and clean boat.  Family had a blast!  Will definitely do business with them again.  Thanks for a great experience the Morgan family.

name: Nicholas Grafe
text: We had a party of 6 including an 8 year old and did the 2 hour dolphin tour. It was an incredible experience. The tour guide was super helpful with every step of the process. The employees are very customer service oriented. I highly recommend Wahoo Watersports to everyone! We will be back!

resp.text: Thank you so much for taking your time to let us know! Our team at Wahoo Watersports continues to do our best to provide a safe, fun and enjoyable experience for our guests. Let us know ahead of time and we will do our best to accommodate, we look forward to having y'all back!

name: Jeremy Witherspoon
text: Great to do business with. Super friendly and considerate. Highly recommend for anyone wanting to do jet skis or anything else they offer. Tyler was super polite.

name: Rose Chikiar
text: This is an unforgettable experience. Forget using any other companies this one is the best! Tyler was a very knowledgeable and instructive guide. We saw dolphins, jelly fish, sting rays, and an eagle. You have to do the jet ski tour with these guys, worth every penny.

name: Kris Horning
text: We rented a pontoon boat and they were great!  Good price and super cool on timing of the return.

name: Zachary Marsh
text: If you are looking to rent jet skis, this is the place to do it! I checked out the other places in the area and none of them had better prices for the experience you get. ZERO no-wake zones to waste your time like the other places. Great military discount/incentives too!!

name: Samantha Wilkinson
text: I will totally be renting from them again they are great....very down to earth people....kind as well....the boat ride was amazing....had a lot of fun

name: Carolynn Gaylord
text: We had such a great time fishing with Captain Brooks & Will!  We caught a good bit of fish, the King Mackeral were biting!  Some boats were fishing we were catching!! Captain Brooks is a 3rd generation fisherman & knows how to put you on the bite!  Thank you Captain Brooks & Will!  I highly recommend you look him up when you are in Orange Beach!

name: Michaela May
text: Had a wonderful time doing the Jet Ski Dolphim tours. Our host Tyler was a hoot, took us around to all the hot spots. We visited sculptures submerged in water, pirate coves, a nest of a bald eagle, 3 different pods of dolphins and had 3 hours of ecstatic fun. All of us in our party fell in but it was a great time and we were all laughing and smiling the whole time. Would one hundred percent recommend, but get your sunscreen on! You also will be sore the next day in your legs so keep that in mind, just a factor of using muscles you dont normally. A fantastic time!

name: Jennifer Cotton
text: We had an awesome experience with Wahoo today. The boat was very nice, well maintained and the people were VERY PERSONABLE. Excellent customer service and warmth... what more can you ask for!

name: Chad Tucker
text: We had a party of 6 and rented 3 jet skis. The guide was very knowledgable and helpful. The 2+ hour dolphin tour was absolutely awesome and extremely high value. I would highly recommend this company to anyone who loves having too much fun. Thanks guys for the wonderful experience.

name: Chris Cash
text: Had a blast!!! Can't wait to go again!!!

name: Mike Sabin
text: Captain Brooks was a great!  His boat, Dark Thirty, was a trusty old gal. We were a party of 4 from Ohio and this was our first deep sea trip in the Gulf. We were here in November, off season, but caught 4 nice Bull Redfisf and 4 King Mackeral.  Loved it.  Great service.  First mate, Will, did a great job of rigging our poles and putting us on the fish. All in all, we highly recommend them.

name: Patrick
text: We went on a dolphin tour with Patrick as our tour guide! It was an absolute blast!! I'm going to recommend this to family and friends! We saw so many dolphins. Patrick was able to get us right on top of them and gave us an amplatude of options while we were out there!! I definitely will be coming back every year!!

name: Andrew Trefny
text: Brooks and Jason are awesome. Don't go out when it's choppy waters. These dudes seriously know what they're doing though. Support the locals for sure.

name: Alex Mounsey
text: I've rented at a couple places the past few years, and this is by far the best. Great wave runners and great hospitality.

name: Joey Roberto
text: Nicest pontoon boat I've ever rented!  Looks and runs brand new.  Great customer service!  Renting again from them today.

name: Charlie Gonzales
text: The best rentals we've found around Perdido. We rented a pontoon boat for 4 hrs and went out to the sand bars. The whole party had a great time.  Our boat was very clean and had Bluetooth radio.

name: Brayden Grimsley
text: Rented jet skis from here and loved it! Fair pricing, great staff, and a decent sized area to ride in

name: David Belser
text: Excellent equipment and very nice guys to deal with.  They had the better looking pontoon boats of all the other places.

name: Redmond Wilkerson
text: Unparalleled hospitality. We called them out of no where to book a fishing charter and didn't know what to do after and they called a taxi for us and gave us hotel recommendations that were perfect. We didn't catch any fish but was worth the experience itself.

resp.text: Thank you so much, we enjoyed having y'all!

name: Chickie Martin
text:
We have rented here in past years, but NEVER again....the pontoons were in deplorable condition, no one was on the premises when we arrived at our reserved time...someone arrived 20 minutes later !
Over the day fee of $450., we were charged more fees,.!

name: Billy Brooks
text: Great experience! Great equipment? Great service! Nice staff!

name: Lee “CHILLEDxFIGHTER” Wells
text: Great, helpful, and great prices

name: Nikki Mutschler
text: I would give no stars if it was possible. We rented a pontoon boat and 4 jet skis. 15 mins into our rental time one of the jet skis wasn't working. We had to tow it back to the rental place. Waited for 20 mins and no one was there. Asked for refund and owner refused to give refund!!!!

resp.text:
Hi NIkki,

We apologize for the inconvenience during your time with us. Yes, unfortunately, even the new 2015 jet skis have unforsseen issues that arise. We offered one of our functional jet skis to make up for the unfortunate situation, and you chose to decline.  As a business, we would lose money if we issued full refunds when working replacement equipment is available. Again, we are very sorry that you didn't enjoy your experience with us.

name: Tyler Jones
text: Hand an amazing time renting our jet skis from wahoo watersports! We rented 4 skis for the hour rental and we had such a good time we decided to go do one of the jet skis dolphin tours with pattrick and had a wonderful time we got to see dolphins and play around a bunch!! It was an awesome experience and I would highly recommend them as a family fun destination.

name: Garrett Orange
text: If looking to go out on the water this is your place to go very affordable and friendly staff

name: Shane Williams
text: They don't have a negative star; otherwise I would use it. Their equipment is old and outdated. Who knows if its even sea worthy.  Their equipment breaks down and they will not refund you. We had to drag a jet ski that stopped working just as soon as we left the marina... We were unable to get in touch with anyone other than the employee who sent us out on the unit. He assured us that instead of sending another ski that they would refund us for one of the units...The owner was disrespectful and very unprofessional! Do not use this company! Im posting to all my friends to warn all of their friends!

name: Clifford Hepler
text: If only 0 stars was an option. Pulled up at roughly 2:15 for the 2:30 dolphin tour. Chose wahoo over dolphins because of the interaction with the dolphins. When we arrived, about 4 ppl were outside. We parked, and the ppl had disappearef. Nobody in the building. Still no appearance by 2:30 so we left. Really would love to know how a business makes money when they cannot have sales due to no personnel around

name: Angie McCurley
text: Loved the dolphin tour and the guide knowledge of area and wildlife.

name: Michael Keene
text: Our experience was top notch. Our paddle boards were brought right to our location on the lagoon which was super convenient. The gear was in new condition and great quality. Scott, the owner, showed up right on time and helped us out to get started since we were complete newbies. Great instruction. Also gave us some great tips on good locations. We saw so much wildlife in such a short time. Thumbs Up!

resp.text: We are delighted you enjoyed your paddle boards! Come again!

name: Alex Toler
text: I have had the pleasure of going on the cruise and renting paddle boards multiple times.  Scott has always been a great captain and teacher.  I highly recommend his services when you're down in Gulf Shores.

resp.text: Thank you so much for the kind words, Alex! Glad you have enjoyed your experience with us and look forward to seeing you and your family again soon.

name: Hannah Sherertz
text: Our experience in Gulf Shores and with Gulf Shores Boat and Paddlesports Rental was awesome! Scott provided pleasant and quick service for all of our groups needs.  He also gave us some great tips on what else to do in the area throughout our stay! We definitely will make Gulf Shores Boat and Paddlesports Rental part of our annual visits.

resp.text: Thank you, Hannah! We are so pleased that you enjoyed your experience. We look forward to seeing you again soon.

name: Mark Roberts
text: Our family had a wonderful sunset cruise with Gulf Shores B & P.  Capt. Scott  was  accommodating to our group (our disabled child needed some extra assistance)  and timed our outing perfectly to catch the beautiful sunset as we watched for dolphins.  The boat was well maintained and I felt safe taking the family out.  We will definitely be going back.

resp.text: Thank you so much for taking the time to share your experience with our service, Mark. We hope to see you and your family in Gulf Shores again soon.

name: Grant Bolding
text: Really great customer service! Scott was awesome and worked with me when we had inclement weather during our kayak rental. I will definitely use them again when I come back to Orange Beach.

resp.text: Thank you, Grant. We always want our customers to have the best time possible. Look forward to seeing you again soon!

name: Maggie tibbetts
text: We had a great time with these boards! We wanted to go paddle boarding and I found Scott on google and texted him. We had the boards delivered the next morning. They were so easy to use and Scott was very friendly and prompt. Amazing experience for the cost. We vacation every year in Gulf Shores and I will be renting from Scott again in the future.

resp.text: Maggie - thank you so much for making us a part of your vacation. So glad you enjoyed your experience and hope to see you again soon! - Gulf Shores Boat and Paddlesports

name: Reade Mitchell
text: Gorgeous Sunset Cruise!   Capt. Scott gave us the perfect way to cap off a full day in Gulf Shores.  The service & the scenery were fantastic.  Definitely will be back again & recommend you do the same!

resp.text: Reade, I remember the cruise we had with you and Carla that evening. It was indeed spectacular that night. We are so happy you enjoyed your experience and hope to see you both again soon.

name: Blackhawkbaker Ashby
text: As a Service Member, R&R is at a premium, and Scott really treated My Family to a top class experience. His gear is all new, and ready to use, unlike other rental spots that aren't willing to upgrade equipment when it's needed. I'd recommend Gulf Shores Boat and Paddleboard Rental to rookies or regulars that demand the best. Thanks Brother!

resp.text: Thank you for the kind review! We do work hard to make sure our gear is in excellent condition and that our guests have the best experience possible. Thank you for your service to our great country, as well. Hope to see you back in Gulf Shores soon.

name: Cary Campbell
text: I've had my boat here a couple years  great marina  great set of guys

name: blake hamilton
text: Easy offload of 1 pontoon boat. Thks guys

name: Eric harmond
text: Good people.  Enjoyed my time there.

name: John Coley
text: Great people and a great product!! Our family went to Rodney’s Marine and spoke to Rodney the owner and Jeff in sales several times over the past year. We told them what we wanted and they never once tried to sell us anything different. We finally found the one we were looking for and pulled the trigger. The SilverWave boats are great and the Suzuki 250SS is a great product to power it with. Will definitely continue to do business with them and refer others.

name: Jesse Lincoln
text: We bought a new Starcraft pontoon in early summer ‘20. I love the boat. Jeff was knowledgeable and helpful. The pandemic caused some difficulty in getting accessories shipped, but ultimately Rodney made sure everything was taken care of and done right.

name: Eric Melville
text: Super nice guys

name: D Boughton
text: Best place anywhere  in Alabama  to buy and service your  boat

name: Chris Maggard
text: Best place for to take care of your boat

name: David Koski
text: Rodney was recommended by two people to me and I was pleased with the work they did on my outboard. Pricing was fair and the professionalism gave me confidence that they were troubleshooting the issue and not just guessing. The only downside was how busy he was and the time it took to get to my boat. That being said I will be using him again for my next issue.

name: Sandra Plylar
text: Nothing but praise for Rodney's Marine Center. Just purchased a boat from him and he really takes care of his customers!

name: Brooke Von Hagel
text: Rodney has a great business. Hes very personable and takes care of whatever needs you might have

name: M Stokes
text: Stopped by today to get a couple of issues looked at on my boat. Rodney worked me into the schedule, and Cody figured out the problems and quickly fixed them. Great guys and service!

name: John Brewer
text: Been knowing Rodney a long time, so glad he went into business for himself!! Takes good care of our boat !!

name: Bobby Ray
text: These guys done an outstanding job on our born again 1995 pontoon. Runs like a new one. And the price didn't break the bank. Great job.

name: nikalena thomas
text: Fantastic folks and great service!

name: Michael Hull
text: Great sales and service.  Highly recommend.

name: MATT LONG
text: Greatest pontoon sales and very knowledgeable of the SILVERWAVE PONTOON

name: Austin G
text: Good place. Easy going folks.

name: Mary Womack
text: Good folks

name: Philip woodard
text: Rodney awesome person to deal with.

name: Elaine Musich
text: Awesome and fast service, so far.

text: Good service
